name: Tanelia Matthews
text: Every single visit always results in me sitting for extended periods of time even with an established appointment time. I think that it’s highly inconsiderate to not respect the patients’ time. Patients are often told to reschedule if they are more than 15 minutes late. How about if you are not called back within 15 minutes of your scheduled appointment time, then patients reschedule for the office to receive their insurance/self-pay money??? There needs to be a better strategy to the scheduling of this facility, so that every patient receives the appropriate care while having their time respected, as well. Everyone does not have 3+ hours of time to sit and wait for a simple doctor’s appointment.

name: Lauren Grzegorczyk
text:
Currently sitting in the parking lot, waiting for a phone appointment with PA Tammie Smith so I can refill important medication. Over an hour and a half ago during my check in, I was told there were 2 people ahead of me. 45 minutes past my appointment time, I’m told there is still 1 person ahead of me. My appointment time was at 1:40, and it is now past 3pm with still no phone call. These phone conferences have never taken more than 5-10 minutes.

I’ve  been coming here for two years, and it’s been absolutely god awful. Never have I been to a Clinic that is this consistency unprofessional, doesn’t pick up the phone half the time, and can easily have you waiting to be seen for up to 2hours, sometimes more. Always severely understaffed as well, which makes me feel bad for the few employees there that are actually kind and decent. If it were not for sliding scale, I would never come back. If you have insurance, avoid this place at all costs. Seriously.

Update: Finally had my phone conference and PA Tammie Smith was rude per usual! Shouldn’t expect anything more from a doctor with multiple 1 star reviews on webmd though, right?

name: cesar ibarra
text: We love our pediatrician at Huntsville Family Health Center.  Dr. Xavier is very thorough and has gone the extra mile when caring for my child- time and time again.  I feel at ease putting the care of my child in Dr. Xavier's hands.  Dr. Xavier listens to me, addresses my concerns, and asks the right questions.  Overall, I'm very satisfied with him and will continue to see him for all of my pediatric needs.

resp.text: Hi Cesar, thank you for your review.  At Huntsville Family Health Center, we strive for excellence in caring for our patients.  We will relay the positive words you shared about Doctor Niraj Xavier with the team.  Thank you for continuing to make us your preferred choice!

name: Michelle Robison
text: Get to appt on time yet always have an hour or more wait before getting called to the back and then still sit in the room longer waiting for the Dr.

name: Chad Chaney
text: Very helpful everytime I go . My wifes diabetic meds costs almost $4000.00 everywhere and here it costs under 100.00

resp.text: Hello Mr. Chaney, thank you for your review about the helpfulness of our team at Huntsville Family Health Center.  We will certainly pass your comments along.

name: Tara Caputo
text: I love Dr. Kurecki and his office staff. He is easy to talk to and really listens! He has a lot of great advice, and I am not waiting 2 weeks to see him. He also has a very diverse background and a lot of medical knowledge. 10/10 recommend if you are looking for a family doc!

resp.text: Hi, Ms. Caputo. Thank you so much for taking the time to share your experience with us. We'll be sure to pass your comments along to our Huntsville Family Health Center team.

name: Sharon Murph
text: The NP was unfriendly, rushing and didn’t listen to my complaints. I want Dr. Lisabeth Williams back!!!

resp.text: Hello, Ms. Murph. We are sorry to hear about this experience. Please consider calling us at (855) 724-7325 so that we can directly address this. Thank you.

name: Nina Thomas
text: Joel is awesome I wish the rest of the staff was like him. He assisted us in ten minutes we had the results we’ve been trying to receive for 21 days no one ever answered the phone so we had to drive to the health center

resp.text: Hi Nina.  Thank you for your feedback.  It will be shared with our leadership team.

name: Sadie Lynch
text: Always a warm welcome doctor Williams is the best

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to leave a review for us here at Huntsville Family Health Center.  We will pass your comments along to our team!

name: Jeanette Torres
text: The dr don’t know what they doing. They don’t really pay attention to what you want to say. The place is not sanitized right.im very unhappy with everything.

resp.text: Hi Jeanette Torres.   It is disappointing to learn that your experience was not positive, and we would like to get more details.  Please reach out to Jalin at 256-533-6311.  Thank you again for taking the time to reach out to us, and we hope to hear from you soon.

name: Kelley Cornelius
text: This office was absolutely laughable. The worst experience I have ever had at a physician's office.  They scheduled an MRI I arrive at the appointment to be sent away due to the fact that this office did not have the correct orders written.  Reschedule for the following week and again incorrect orders.  Mind you the place where I was having the MRI done also called multiple times and even physically went to this office to try to get things done.  Finally have the MRI done and they had the results the next day and two weeks later still no phone call about the results after I have called multiple times, left messages for a return phone call multiple times.  Then today I get someone FINALLY live on the phone and this person could not even pronounce the medical terminology, I ask to speak with someone else and she transfers me to an extension where the mailbox is full and I can't leave a message.  Soooo frustrated and changing to a new TRICARE provider.

resp.text: Hi Kelley, thank you for bringing this matter to our attention.  We are disappointed to hear of your negative experience with us.  Your review will be provided to our leadership team for addressing.  In the meantime, please call Jalin at 256-533-6311.  Thank you.

name: Madison Lowry
text: dr love does not listen and will talk over you. he is very rude and also likes to joke on you at your own expense. his nurses were phenomenal though and they’re the only reason HFHC isn’t getting 1 star.

resp.text: Hi Madison.  We are sorry to hear that you had a bad experience.  We will share your feedback with our leadership team.  In the meantime, please consider calling our Director of Operations, Joel Rojas at 256-533-6311 ext. 2234.

name: Sherry Black
text:
I am pretty sure it depends on who your doctor is, but... I never have to wait long when I go to my doctor! Rather I have an appointment or they are working me in, it is NEVER a long wait!
Dr Kurecki is my doctor & I think highly of him! I am very confident putting my health in his hands!

name: Matt Nieves
text: If it wasn't for how nice the doctor was w me I would've said 0 staff is very not proffesional and rude, the lady in the laboratory thinks she can treat everybody however she wants which not very proffesional I would not recommend this place

resp.text: Hello Matt.  Thank you for bringing this matter up to our attention.   Although you had a positive interaction with the doctor, we are disappointed to learn of your entire experience.  Please call our Director of Operations, Joel Rojas at 256-533-6311 ext. 2234 so that we can properly document your concern.  Thank you.

name: noella hall
text: My husband has been going to Dr Kurecki for some time now. He has always been at ease and all issues discussed, we absolutely love him.

name: Tea Raine
text: I went my first time and was happy to get help. Staff was nice and caring.

name: Cheria Moore
text: The staff on the first floor were amazing and very polite! On the second floor the nurse practitioner was rude, displayed unprofessional behavior and I will not be returning to this clinic!

name: Rebecca Louthan
text: The staff is very unprofessional and rude. I have never in my life been treated so poorly before.

name: Airi Ventura
text: My partner spent over $60 round trip to get help for his medical issues here, waited for over two hours, and then got told that there's nothing he could do about it. No referrals to any specialists, nothing. Don't go here unless you have no other choice.

name: Deanna Resler
text: Best I've had in a long time really cared and got me the right refferal needed for my gallbladder surgery I will defaintly be back for future sickness

text: Worst doctors office I've ever been to PLEASE DO DON'T WASTE YOUR TIME I had a appointment at 1pm waited two hrs! Still didn't see the doctor if I could give it a negative star I would

text:

Finally have the MRI done and they had the results the next day and two weeks later still no phone call about the results after I have called multiple times, left messages for a return phone call multiple times.  Then today I get someone FINALLY live on the phone and this person could not even pronounce the medical terminology, I ask to speak with someone else and she transfers me to an extension where the mailbox is full and I can't leave a message.  Soooo frustrated and changing to a new TRICARE provider.

resp.text: Hi Kelley, thank you for bringing this matter to our attention.  We are disappointed to hear of your negative experience with us.  Your review will be provided to our leadership team for addressing.  In the meantime, please call Jalin at 256-533-6311.  Thank you.

name: Madison Lowry
text: dr love does not listen and will talk over you. he is very rude and also likes to joke on you at your own expense. his nurses were phenomenal though and they’re the only reason HFHC isn’t getting 1 star.

resp.text: Hi Madison.  We are sorry to hear that you had a bad experience.  We will share your feedback with our leadership team.  In the meantime, please consider calling our Director of Operations, Joel Rojas at 256-533-6311 ext. 2234.

name: Sherry Black
text:
I am pretty sure it depends on who your doctor is, but... I never have to wait long when I go to my doctor! Rather I have an appointment or they are working me in, it is NEVER a long wait!
Dr Kurecki is my doctor & I think highly of him! I am very confident putting my health in his hands!

name: Matt Nieves
text: If it wasn't for how nice the doctor was w me I would've said 0 staff is very not proffesional and rude, the lady in the laboratory thinks she can treat everybody however she wants which not very proffesional I would not recommend this place

resp.text: Hello Matt.  Thank you for bringing this matter up to our attention.   Although you had a positive interaction with the doctor, we are disappointed to learn of your entire experience.  Please call our Director of Operations, Joel Rojas at 256-533-6311 ext. 2234 so that we can properly document your concern.  Thank you.

name: noella hall
text: My husband has been going to Dr Kurecki for some time now. He has always been at ease and all issues discussed, we absolutely love him.

name: Tea Raine
text: I went my first time and was happy to get help. Staff was nice and caring.

name: Cheria Moore
text: The staff on the first floor were amazing and very polite! On the second floor the nurse practitioner was rude, displayed unprofessional behavior and I will not be returning to this clinic!

name: Rebecca Louthan
text: The staff is very unprofessional and rude. I have never in my life been treated so poorly before.

name: Airi Ventura
text: My partner spent over $60 round trip to get help for his medical issues here, waited for over two hours, and then got told that there's nothing he could do about it. No referrals to any specialists, nothing. Don't go here unless you have no other choice.

name: Deanna Resler
text: Best I've had in a long time really cared and got me the right refferal needed for my gallbladder surgery I will defaintly be back for future sickness

name: Javon Green
text: Worst doctors office I've ever been to PLEASE DO DON'T WASTE YOUR TIME I had a appointment at 1pm waited two hrs! Still didn't see the doctor if I could give it a negative star I would

name: Alexis Olson
text:
Waited over 2 hours. I've never seen the Dr. It's always his nurse. Tried to call his answering service to cancel my appointment and the lady said she didn't even have my Dr's name in her computer.
Trust me when I say go somewhere else.

name: Latasha Rodgers
text: Got to the front door yeah

name: Lindsey Rinehart
text: They wouldn't let me schedule an appointment even after 4:00 yesterday for a Saturday appointment.. told me I had to wait until 8 Saturday morning.. took the receptionist 30 minutes to pick up the phone! Schedules us a 10:00 appointment... it is now 11:00 we have finally been moved from the car to a room a HOUR LATER and still no sign of the DR! What are appointment times for anyway!!!!!

name: scott carver
text: Dr Carter is the best pediatrician you will ever find. There’s no question about that or the staff that supports him. However, the front desk is pretty rude and unhelpful. I just called before closing time (which I understand is frustrating. I’ve worked retail and had customers walk in my store as we were going to lock the doors), but this is my child’s health. Every call should be handled with care. I was told they can’t make any promises for a call back on a prescription, and “it’s 5 o’ clock and we’re trying to get out of here”. I’ll probably end up at urgent care this evening because my call was an inconvenience.

name: Courtney Johnson
text: My husband and I love this practice! Dr. Darby is so kind, patient, and knowledgeable. The nurses call back quickly, and they never make you feel silly for asking questions. The office has done a great job of navigating sick and well visits during COVID-19. We would highly recommend this practice!

name: Khurram Ali
text: Really great doctors and good service my kids have been going to this place since birth we loved doctor Petelos but he retired

name: Al (New World)
text: I went to Greenvale as a child so I was hoping to use them for my first born son. Upon calling weeks ago they did say they were accepting new patients. Upon calling to schedule a ruben(weight check) the reception staff was rude and dismissive. Made it seem like I was trying to get my son into a country club or something. I know 100% this place is not nicer or better than any other pediatrician office so they should not act this way. I needed an important visit on a Sunday which they were open but was let known that they would probably not accept my son and they would call on Monday. I would never take my son to be treated by such horrible people.

name: Rebecca Wood
text: We love Dr. Wright! He is so sweet with my baby girl and genuinely cares about her. I also have never had a problem with the front desk/office (mentioned in other reviews) - they've always been very nice and happy to help.

name: Jason Michael
text: My wife and I absolutely love Greenvale in Hoover! The ladies at the front desk have always been very pleasant and helpful. Dr. Irons and Dr Wright are wonderful and always patient with our numerous questions as first time parents.  The staff are extremely efficient/thorough/accommodating/genuine. Can’t say enough good things about this office. Highly recommended

name: Courtney Shugart
text: We have been seeing Dr. Carter here since December 2014. He is phenomenal. He has always been so caring and genuine. And he listens to us and takes our concerns into consideration. We have always had a wonderful experience there and never had any issues with anyone. Miss Ty is a rockstar and made me feel so much better about needing to get formula for my baby girl. I highly recommend this pediatricians office to anyone. We have also seen a handful of other doctors there for sick appointments and they have all been wonderful and kind.

name: Claire Acree
text: Dr. Stewart and Jennifer (nurse) are amazing!

name: Courtney Shugart
text: We have been seeing Dr. Carter here since December 2014. He is phenomenal. He has always been so caring and genuine. And he listens to us and takes our concerns into consideration. We have always had a wonderful experience there and never had any issues with anyone. Miss Ty is a rockstar and made me feel so much better about needing to get formula for my baby girl. I highly recommend this pediatricians office to anyone. We have also seen a handful of other doctors there for sick appointments and they have all been wonderful and kind.

name: Heidi Syx
text: We have been seeing Dr. Stone for 9 years now and love him. He is explains things so that parents and children both understand. All the Dr's and staff at the hoover office are very professional. I would recommend anyone with children.

name: Andi Friel
text: Caring Pediatricians, Nurses & Staff! They have the experience to take care of your children & put you all at ease.  Short wait times, (huge plus!) engaging, & kid friendly wait areas.

name: cht
text: I have been calling this office multiple times a week for over a month to schedule an appointment to establish care with my two children. The front desk have been very rude and condescending on each encounter. Looking at other reviews it seems that this is a similar trend. I cannot speak to how the doctors or the nurses are, but the front desk should be nicer to the patients and their families. It's disappointing that this clinic has employees who serve as the frontlines who are so disrespectful to their patients. For an example, I called the office explaining that my prior pediatrician's office had spoken with "Natasha" on XX/XX date at 1:22pm and verified the fax number prior to faxing the records. The secretary I spoke with snapped back with a rude tone, "Well as of XX/XX (Today's date) at 10:45AM, I have not received anything from that office." Clearly customer service ideologies are lacking at this practice. A more appropriate response would have been, "I'm sorry, but we have not received any faxes from that office. I can look into why that is." Or "Let me see what I can do to help." I am very disappointed with the lack of professionalism in this practice.

name: The Southern Maple
text: Our doctor here has been good and we love our nurse (Jennifer) But the ladies at the reception desk are so ungodly rude and confrontational that we will be transferring to a different pediatrician asap.

name: Alfred Swartz
text:
Here's a thought Anonymous. First realize things has changed for Doctors with Obamacare. Many patients can't pay and the Clinic has to eat much of that cost. One day working with a Doctor and you'd find that yes, it's a hectic line of work because all the patients thinks their case is the most important.
Write down your questions prior to taking your Child to the Doctor and understand IF you think of a question after leaving don't expect them to be sitting there waiting to answer the question. Their not.You were one in 50 to 60  patients they see everyday. You said they do call at closing time so why you feel put out makes no sense. If it's that important I'd advise you to take your Child back to the Doctor.
I don't know these people but all the other reviews are glowing. I'm a Paramedic and work with Doctors and believe me, they have their hands full. Be Thankful you have a Doctor you can trust with your Child.

name: Sara Gentry
text: We have used Greenvale for over 6 years and love all the doctors and nurses on staff. Great service during the week and weekend when the unexpected illness happens!!! Recommend them to all new parents or those looking for a new pediatrician. Our favorites without a doubt are Dr. Stone and Dr. Cortopassi!!!

name: Jamie Russell
text: The front desk is awful. They have put me in tears I'm more than one occasion.  They huff and roll their eyes and act like they are extremely inconvenienced to help.  I get knots thinking about dealing with them. Love Dr. Carter though. I wish they would revamp the front desk staff.

name: Tori May
text: This office is absolutely terrible! They have refused to see my daughter 3x while hurt or sick. The last time, I went in person with my sick child and the office manager came out and said all the doctors said they could not see her. There were maybe 2 people in the waiting room an hour and half before closing time. I am in the process of changing dr. Offices now!

name: Traci Naramore
text: We've used Dr. Cortopassi with all three kids and he's been great!  Now my older two have graduated out of pediatrics.  I love how he always treated me like we were working together.  When I tried things at home before bringing in the kids, he never talked down to me.  He is funny and goofy to the kids, which helped put them more at ease.  I have no complaints with the staff.

name: Scott Fancher
text: Margaret Fancher- We have seen Dr. Dudgeon for 9 years now. Our son had many medical issues early on in life and was that kid that just always has something rare happen. Dr. Dudgeon helped us through all of it and referred us to the right specialists that could best help our son. He is very personable and is great with his patiant's. His nurse is also very helpful, even with all of my crazy questions. My son sees several doctors but Dr. Dudgeon is one that I trust completely and know that he always does what is best for his patients.

name: Diamond Bray
text: My son Dr.Julia Stewart is the best, she works with you in any type of problem or situation, she listens and she is a sweetheart, he loves it here and the other Doctors and staff are awesome as well...Thanks guys😘😘

name: Geri-Martha O’Hara
text: Dr.Carter is the absolute best pediatrician! The entire staff is so friendly and helpful! We are so grateful for this crew!

name: Latraunda Smith
text: So far so good, Sometimes the wait times are ridiculous while other times your're in and out, doctors and staff make you feel at ease and the office is typically clean and welcoming.  I wish they had more available times for appointments that are call ins.

name: JRicky
text:
Front office/reception & checkout is cold rude & confrontational.
Lydia (nurse) is the same (needs charm school).
Dr. Jeff Stone is great.
IF,    we go back it will be because of him.

name: Amy Garner (Work)
text: We go to the Hoover office--they are good about getting you an appointment the same day if you have a sick kid. They also have weekend hours for sick appointments, which is great for working parents.

name: Ashley Mills
text: We love Greenvale!  Our main Dr. is Carter, but we've loved everyone we've had to see.

name: Anne Riley
text: All of the doctors here are just amazing. I've loved every single one that we have seen (although Cortopassi is our favorite, since he's ours!).

name: Cilinda Dentici
text: Was at Greenville Pediatrics, with, Charity McClanahan " Bain" and Alex Bain. There's some really great Doctors in this office. We didn't have to wait past our scheduled appointment time. All the staff treated us very well and took note of any and all concerns we had. Would highly recommend this doctors office.

name: Steven Knestrict
text:
Dr.s and Nurses were great, very nice, and very helpful, and showed concern for our sickly baby boy.

Front office staff makes me not want to return. I had no personal issues with them, but watching the way they spoke to every client after us  disgusted me. Not only did they have a sny and condoscensing tone with everyone, the worst part was hearing them bad mouth the patients after they left ear shot. Very rude, very unproffesional.

name: Rachel Stone
text: Dr. Cortopassi is absolutely the best of the best! We love all of the staff!

name: Rk AR
text: Always have to wait for long time with lil baby.

name: Mark
text: Requested a doctor for my two girls and never got an answer even after I went back 3 times. Front desk is very rude and dismissive.

name: Matt Johnson
text: Very quick checking you in and getting you back to see a Dr.

name: Jackie Hudson
text: We love Dr. Stone!

name: Jazmine Marintsch
text: Front desk is very rude.

name: Ben and Caitlin Moffatt
text: Front desk is very rude!!

text:
(Translated by Google) Dr. Drew Wright is an excellent professional and speaks Spanish very well!

(Original)
El Dr. Drew Wright es un excelente profesional y habla muy bien el Español!

name: Elaina Leal
text: I have used this clinic for 15 years and I hate the new staff I want all the old people i don't do or like change so I'm changing doctors

name: Lark Roberson
text: The lady that does the triage and the people that see you before the doc are great, but the wait time is absolutely ridiculous! I had to wait an HOUR AND A HALF for a doctor to see me. Please learn how to schedule properly and see people on time because there are things people need to do!

name: LeShawn Watson
text: My kids have been coming to this clinic for the last 5yrs and the last 2x I have been there has been a issue the first issue was they forgot us and missed plAced her paperwork. And this time we were scheduled to come in but the weather was bad so they had to reschedule  us she scheduled us for 12:00 we get there I'm told they do not see pt until 12:45 I informed her that's not what I was told I took my lunch to bring her in had I knew that she was a work in I would have came at 4 when I got off it is truly sad how this office has went down the only area that I can say good service would be the receptionist and the nursing assistant. The rest of the office is slow they procrastinate doing everything from taking blood until the doctor come in just sad!!!!!!!!!

name: tangineka webb
text: They are so nice I love this clinic

name: Rhonda Mannon
text: Friendly staff and are really good with my children! Highly recommended.

name: Erasmeye Baylis
text: Staff are very friendly and are great at answering questions over the phone.

name: Kensley Lewis
text: They take a little while sometimes, but great place for our son in the Shoals area

name: Alicia Lokey
text: Amazing team @ Dothan Pediatrics and @ Ozark Pediatrics...second to none in our state! If you want to know what a physician is made of, give him to a single mother whose only child battles leukemia, at the age of 3, and for a decade! These docs are amazing and they could never do it without their support staff. As most of you know, I am a high maintenance mama, and even more so when it comes to Conner Wade. The family of Dothan & Ozark Pediatrics became our family and carried us in some of life’s most difficult moments. You can trust them with yours! 💯

name: LeighAnn Gunter
text: Dr. Brown and Dr. Stinson are wonderful!!

name: Shay South
text: Today was the first bad experience I’ve had here. My son was humiliated and his heart was broken. A doctor (not our usual doctor) told my son he was not brave. My son has anxiety problems and he has ADHD. He had to get a flu shot today and he was nervous about it. This doctor told him if he was brave that he would get an extra sticker. He was given his shot and he freaked out a little bit but NOTHING like he did last flu season. He did NOT have to be held down but the nurse who had administered the shot told the doctor that she had to hold my son down to give him the shot. Afterwards, the doctor handed my son two stickers and he said, “I thought you said you would give me an extra sticker if I was brave.” And this doctor responds with, “Well you were not that brave. The nurse said she had to hold you down.” #1: My son was very brave. He is a naturally nervous person and he’s six. Yes, he freaked out a little. #2: My son was NOT held down. I don’t like posting this kind of content, but my son’s spirit was BROKEN. The look on his face whenever he turned to look at me, after the doctor said this, literally broke my heart! If I would have been quick with my words I would have said something. Instead, I’m posting it here. Since we have left the doctor, he has mentioned to me about him not being brave several times. This is NOT okay. I won’t name the doctor, but she knows who she is. Other than this, I have never had a problem with this office. Dr Brown is an amazing doctor and very thorough and thoughtful and so are the rest of the staff.

resp.text: Hi Shay, we are very sorry that you did not have a positive experience in our clinic today. Our office manager should be reaching out to you or you can give her a call 334-445-7337 (ext. 6100)

name: Sacher Dickson
text: We have ALWAYS experienced great care at this facility for our daughter. Dr. Brown is a very knowledgeable pediatrician that has gone above and beyond for our family. If I could give this a higher rating than 5 stars, I would.

name: kathryn turpin
text: Loved Dr and the office staff. But they do not send bills/invoices and i have caught them over billing me several times. Be sure you know what your insurance covers

resp.text: Hi Kathryn! Please give us a call here at the office 334-445-7337 (ext. 6100) and let us work with you to resolve any issues.

name: Kim Hunt
text: Dr. Brown and Dr. stinson, are absolutely the most caring pediatricians I have ever dealt with.  Dr. Brown is hands down the best. He listens and truly cares about his patients.

name: LadyCath1990 CLUS
text: Always polite & takes real good care of my kids health wise.

name: Becky Grider
text:
We love Dr Brown and his staff. Nicole Burke's and Misty Blakenship are two of the most caring nurse's and are great @ what they do! Dr. Brown is genuine and takes his time with his patients. He is a natural. I trust Dr. Brown and his staff with my all of my children's medical needs. Let's not forget the administrative side for the receptionist's are awesome as well!!
Thanks!!

name: Abby Boyd
text: Dr. Brown is so amazing with my child!

name: Monica Jenkins
text: Love the clinic! Great experience and excellent care. Love Dr. Brown!!

name: Karri S
text: Dr. Stenson was very thorough and kind.

name: Amanda Dzindolet
text: This pediatrician denies teenage kids health care depending on education???? Is that a allowed legal policy?

resp.text: We are sorry that you were unhappy with your recent visit to Ozark Pediatric Clinic. Please give us a call at 334-445-7337 ext. 6100 to discuss this further.

name: Kathy Pope
text: Dr. Bill was  our doctor for many years no complaints. Now we have Dr. Sellers. He is good and has is a caring, smart doctor.

name: Kaitlyn Nunalee
text: My husband and I had numerous pediatricians come into our room after having my son and as soon as we spoke with Dr. Sellers we knew he was going to be our doctor! He always asks how we are and makes my son smile whenever we’re there. We actually switched doctors to someone closer to home but switched back to Dr. Sellers immediately because he is truly the sweetest and most caring doctor. Highly recommend!

name: Christy McGowan
text:
Best Pediatric office around
Took my daughter in for a flu shot. Of course she was scared as she is only 6. Vanessa the nurse was outstanding .She was very patient , kind and professional. I’m so impressed. We love Dr Farr and the entire staff at Birmingham Pediatric Associates. We have been coming here since we chose Dr Farr at my delivery.

name: Maria U
text: Dr. Wamack is the best pediatrician you could ask for. He never makes you feel rushed, always answers all your questions and gives you great tips. Staff was also very helpful.

name: Bailey Scott
text: I am SO pleased with this practice. It was recommended to me by my OBGYN while I was pregnant with my baby. Dr. Sellers has been fantastic! I never have to wait for my baby to be seen, he asks me how my husband and family are doing and calls them by name, and whenever I have had questions he does extensive research and the nurses call me back with more information. They make me feel so at ease and I am confident my baby is getting the best care. HIGHLY recommend this practice!

name: Randall Shue
text: Doctor Sellers is the best

name: Erin Davis
text: I can’t say enough about this practice. We see Dr. Farr, but have had great experiences with every provider there. Minimal wait time while at the same time never feel rushed or symptoms taken lightly. I 100% recommend B’ham Peds

name: Dana Luker
text: We love Dr. Wamack! He is always so helpful and friendly! If we ever have any questions he is very helpful. Ws would recommend him to anyone!

name: LP
text: Both of my children see Dr. Womack.  He is one of the best Dr.s I have ever encountered.  He really listens to your concerns and your child's symptoms.  When we leave his office I always feel as though my children have received the best and most thorough care.

name: stephanie lopez
text: We LOVE Dr. Tapley.  We never have to wait more than 5 minutes.  The majority of the time we don't even sit down in the waiting room before our name is called.  Dr. Tapley always spends a lot of time with us and takes time get get to know us on a personal level.  My girls absolutely love her.  She sings to them, plays with them and has won their hearts and ours!  We have also seen a few other doctors when Dr. Tapley was out of the office and they have all been very caring.  If Dr. Tapley ever leaves, we are going wherever she goes, even if it's to another state!

name: Michele Melvin
text: Took care of my son for 18 years. Love the doctors, nurses and staff. DR.  Wamack is the best doctor ever. Makes your child feel at ease and never talks down to them or the parents. We miss him now that my son is all grown up.

name: Angela Lewis
text: I've used the same Dr. here for 15 years. I drive 2 hours for this Dr and I have 4 children. Would not take them anywhere else. He correctly diagnosed my child and saved his life twice. Very professional and courteous. The same staff has been there as long as I have which means low turn over which means they are good to staff.

name: Tim Clark
text: Horrible office!!!!!  They're more concerned with how you're paying your co-pay versus servicing a sick child.  Good luck getting an appointment with the actual Doctor.  We've been a dozen times and end up getting the physician's assistant 90% of the time.  And, that's only after waiting 45-60 minutes in the back.  There's nothing like testing the patience of a small sick child and have them sit and wait to be seen.  We're leaving the practice and I would NOT recommend anyone go.

name: Bryn Gaston
text: I've gone to Dr. Goldsmith and Dr. Womack my entire life, and they're going to have to kick me out when I'm too old to go, because I won't willingly leave on my own! I love them both as my doctors and as my trusted friends. They treat us like family, and I couldn't ask for better doctors!

name: Marianne Dacey
text: My kids love Dr. Tapley! We can't imagine seeing any other pediatrician.

name: Kel Kel
text: Been looking for a good pediatrician for my kids so called to ask we're they taking new patients and if they accepted medicaid they said yes. So I filled out the medical release forms and brought them up to their office. When trying to turn them the desk clerks looked clueless like they didnt know what the  forms were for. Then at the last minute told they do not take medicaid.....wasted all that time for nothing! I almost cried it was so embarrassing. Very unprofessional I DO NOT RECOMMEND this place!!!!!!!!!!!!

name: Tina Olive
text: Love the doctors but the staff forgot to put our appointment in the computer 3 times. After the 3rd time we called it quits.

name: Amanda Smith
text: We love Birmingham Pediatrics and Dr. Tapley!

name: Tiffany McAnnally
text: Everything you could as for in a pediatric group and more.

name: Misty Loffer
text: The office is super clean and the staff are very friendly. Dr Lozano is great with my son and it shows he genuinely cares.

name: Elizabeth Anna Arriaga4
text: Dr.Lozano truly is the best, he always takes the time to listen to my concerns about my son, and has always explained everything to me in a way that I understand, i would have no problems in highly recommending him.

name: L C
text: Absolutely the best doctor and best staff🙌🏻❤️

name: Nichole kennedy
text: Oh my goodness how exciting to know Dr Lozono is closer to where I live. Seriously he is the best . I’ll never forget sitting at Chikdrens Hospital with my mother and being told that my baby girl was gonna need to have a feeding tube. I was in choke and disbelief, this was most definitely not what I was expecting to hear .i’ll never forget his exact words once he helped us to cope with such shocking news. He said oh your gonna love it and he made a little poo noise and said you can give her all her meds through it, it’s the best thing ever. At the time I’m sure my looks at him were like really are you serious, lol. He was exactly right we loved it That is now the first thing I say as well when I find out a new mommy or anyoneelse for that matter is facing a feeding tube. He’s just a god sent seriously . He’s so very compassionate, kind and oh his heart  is just really genuine . You just don’t find many drs with these characteristics. He came up with the best concoction to help treat my daughter and to this day we are still using his method of treatment . Do not even second guess him, he is one of our best . I am so very thankful to this day god placed him on our lives .

name: Carrie Leonard
text: He is the best pediatric pulmonary doctor in Alabama.  My daughter has been his patient for 15 years now.

name: Summer Smith
text: We love Dr. Lozano

name: Kerstin Kistler
text: I switched to SWC and Dr Cooper after I had a traumatic birth experience at another BHM hospital. Dr Cooper and her staff are lovely and kind. They truly care for their patients and listen.  The midwives are fantastic and when I went through my second pregnancy I felt that I could trust them with my care. I recommend this place to every women who desires to be treated with respect and who wants her voice to be heard. They are very friendly towards natural birthing, breastfeeding and low intervention.

name: Angela Hollis
text: ENT office was nice and clean. Very fast and timely service. Dr. Clark was awesome. He was very thorough.

resp.text: Thanks for the review!

name: JoAnn Flood
text: The doctors are wonderful. Love my doctor. Dr Williams is my Dr. He is a very caring and concern Dr. About your health. I don't like the idea of paying all that money to park when you are there for a doctors appointment. I can understand if you were parking to visit someone. You have to pay copay, pay for medicine and pay to park. There should be free parking for doctors visits or a discount.

resp.text: We're so glad you had a good experience with us! Thanks for your review, JoAnn.

name: Felisha Chism
text: My mother’s physician is Dr. William Kirby. He and the nurse staff are absolutely excellent. Always caring. Always flexible and patient. They are about patient care. I would highly recommend this clinic.

resp.text: Thanks for your review Felisha! We always try our best to give our patients the quality care they deserve. Let us know if we can do anything else for you.

name: Bellalinn
text: Dr. Ballio is a very nice and professional doctor. Staff is always kind and smiling. Just saw a new GYN doctor Ballio sent me to. Her name is Dr. Collins and I found her to be very nice. She addressed everything I spoke of and treated me with dignity. This is so important.

resp.text:
We're glad you had a nice visit with us, Bella!

Thanks for your review too!

name: Brooke Quintero
text: Dr. Cooper is absolutely amazing. She made my second Birth and PP experience The best I could ask for and more. The Nurses are so kind and genuinely love their job and serving you. The midwives are equally amazing and will be right there with you through labor. Best Labor and Delivery in Birmingham. Hands down.

resp.text: Brooke, thank you so much for the positive review.  We wish you and your family the best!

name: Tammy Price
text: Easy in and out .Friendly staff.

name: Aminah Shah
text:
I’ve had great experiences with the doctors from Simon-Williamson clinic that I’ve used: Dr. Tibbetts (pediatrics), Dr. LeCroy (ophthalmology), and Dr. Wood (internal medicine). There were a couple of doctors that have left the clinic but who were also wonderful. I’ve found the staff to be generally very nice and helpful. Parking is a little pricey, but that’s just part of it. It’s not the clinic’s fault.

I’ve signed up for the health records app, and most of my doctors have been very timely in recording results.

Overall, I am a happy client of SWC.

name: ArianaSaré P.
text: This place charged me for someone else's bill; it's been 3 weeks and they still have not refunded the money they owe my husband and I. They are so unprofessional, I do not recommend.

name: Alexcia
text: Worst hospital ever!!!! Dr. William Kirby and his NP Samantha Williams are the most incompetent people in the medical field. They refuse to run necessary test to rule out various health conditions and then when you fight for medical care they dismiss you as a patient. If you want to die this is the place to go. If otherwise go to UAB.

name: Sharrah Gibson
text: I'm originally from Birmingham and I just recently moved back to Birmingham, so I called the Simon-Williamson clinic today to establish care w/ a primary physician.  I think the person I talked to over the phone name was Donna. And one of the 1st things she said to me was "none of our doctors prescribe long term pain medications".  Then she asked me what current medications was I on? Before even really trying to figure out my need I fell like she automatically assumed with her questions and her tone that I was a drug seeking patient with numerous heath concerns.  Even when I told her I'm just new in town, and just wanted to establish care w/ a physician, she still did not listen to me.  She proceeded to tell me that most of the doctors that are accepting new patients will have to receive my medical records and review them 1st before taking me on as a patient.  She told me to go to the website, look at the doctors then call her back.  I've never had this type of customer service before in my life!! 😩😡 I felt like she made so many assumptions w/o discovering my real need.  I'm a healthy 32 year old that just wants to be proactive w/ my health.  You do not only have to go to the doctor when you are sick!!

name: Hannah Miller
text: I made an appointment 2 weeks prior to today and confirmed it with a receptionist over the phone who was not very personable to begin with. I was told how to get here, what floor, what time and even to arrive early. I arrive and the receptionist tells me that she doesn’t even have me scheduled for an appointment yet she took my personal information over the phone! This is ridiculous. She then proceeded to ask if I’d like to schedule an appointment. I did not drive all the way up here to schedule an appointment! I will be finding a new primary care physician. My time, energy, & pto has been wasted today.

name: Josh B
text:
Had a child at Princeton, Dr. E. was assigned to us as a pediatrician while in postpartum.  Dr. E. seemed knowledgeable and friendly in the two times he visited us after the birth. The first time he gave our baby an exam and "tested" his reflexes.  The second time he came by was similar to the first. Together both visits cost $240 and were less than 30min each. In addition to Dr. E's visit we were discharged by Dr. T.  Dr. T. did less than Dr. E. though the visit was similar to the other two.  $100 for less than 30min as per statement.

As a cash paying patient, I would have liked to have been notified of the additional charges ahead of time. In addition, I would have expected a higher quality of care for what i was charged. Overall, one star per Dr and minus three for the unnecessarily expensive and deceptive billing practices.

name: Megan Rowe
text: If 0 Stars was an option I would leave it for the primary care physician staff at this clinic. Appointment times are changed without notification and there is NO patient consideration when it comes to time. The staff is very unhelpful and was refused to be transferred to the patient care representatives by the operator. If you have the ability to use a different clinic I highly recommend it. Birmingham is full of wonderful internal medicine physicians but the staff at this clinic makes the experience negative.

name: Terri Ward
text: I worked there and it was awful. I've never worked with doctor's who didn't care about people, like those there. I worked with Dr. Cotton and she would get mad at me for helping our elderly patients fill out their paperwork.  She would say " if they needed help, they should've brought their family with them". That is just the tip of the iceberg. Most employee's were nice, but I would never want a doctor from there.

name: Google User
text: I love the doctors. They were so good to me during my pregnacy and was willing to answer any questions I had as a new mom. My son sees the peditricion there. The only thing that makes me not wanna go to our appointments is having to pay for the parking. I moved here from another state and I've never had to pay to get out of the parking lot.

name: Debra Parker
text: It was very busy...

name: Albert McWilliams Sr
text: I do not recommend this facility. I don't believe their primary concern is quality healthcare. Many of the staff members are very adversarial, and cavalier in their interactions with patients.

name: Marilyn Evans
text: Leia the operator is at SWC gives very good customer service. I was not having a good day. She made me feel better by being very courteous to me. Thanks Leia.

name: hugh darty
text: Get ready to sit in the waiting room for hours. Came over to pick up a pair of replacement hearing aids and now am 1.5 hours past pickup time and no end in sight. Been trying to get these picked up for two weeks as they have been here that long according to their representatives. Very unorganized. Had a brother in law sit here all day once as they lost his appointment in the system.

name: Charles Pace
text:
Do NOT see Dr James Lindsey. He has been my doctor for 30 years. Liked him better when he had his other nurse, not WENDY... She has screwed up my meds more times than I can count. When my mom was sick with cancer, he told us (the family) that we should leave the hospital room and pull the plug .She lived 4 more months WITHOUT PAIN, thanks to another doctor.   Wendy left me a message, that I still have, telling me that Ambien 10 is going To be discontinued, I contacted the manufacturer. They said they weren't doing any discontinuing.  I called to see about signing a release for my medical records to be sent to another doctor (because he would not fill my diuretic or Ambien) both I had been on for years with no side effects, Wendy called my pharmacist and deactivated all my meds .Thank God I got the refills before this happened. Anyway, tons more
Going to file with the Board, BBB ETC .

name: Mandy Jones
text: I had surgery here and I didn't receive but a low dose of pain meds while in tears begging to go home talking to my nurse singing my papers she was like wow no wonder your hurting so bad she did read my chart what if she had given me the wrong medication also I was paying what I could every month but they turned in over to a collection agency so now it goes on my credit the are just money hungry and dont care about you they also let homeless people and drugged up people set in the ER waiting room they beg for money and try to steal your stuff if you go here good luck.

name: daphne richardson
text: I recently visited Dr. Williams (OBGYN), she was very informative and attentive but her nurse was very rude.

name: Brenden Perry
text: SWC and the doctors/nurses there have always been so  helpful and have always been there to assist with every medical need! I would recommend SWC to anyone that needs specialized care!

name: Lanard Crawford
text: Dr.C.Harris and his nurse especially Paula C are the worst people I have ever met all they want to do is keep on using your insurance he kept on telling me different stuff of wrong with me he must need to go back to medical school cuz he is doing in my opinion the worst doctor I have ever came in contact with and his staff are so rude and the doctor office is so nasty my opinion don't waste your time everytime I call I never got a return phone call he don't have time for his patients please don't waste your time going there

name: Grey Peterson
text: The person who answers the phone is rude.

name: Corey Crawford
text: I   had to   get a new doctor  cause Dr.harris was only concerned  about money he didn't  care about my health  I hate I wasted  my time  wouldn't  recommend  him to  a dead dog and the staff is awful

name: R Devon Peoples
text: They are pleasant, clean, helpful

name: Senator Bates
text: Try another hospital please!!!!!!!!

name: Barbara Sturdivant
text: Great  staff

name: Michelle Sieck
text: Dr. Sivanandam is a phenomenal pediatrician. He cares for his patients and the families. I have seen him outside of the office, and he will ask about our kids, He is truly compassionate and caring.

resp.text: We really appreciate your positive review! Thank you. -Ascension Providence Community Manager

name: Manuela Smith
text: Great personality, very friendly and professional.

resp.text: Thank you for your kind words and this wonderful review! -Ascension Providence Community Manager

name: S Glass
text: We love this office but especially Brandi, NP. We are new to the area and she has been such a blessing to our family. Our kids really enjoy their visits with her and the entire staff. She is extremely professional and detail oriented. I would HIGHLY recommend to anyone seeking pediatric care for their kids.

name: Robert C
text: Dr. Trumbull and his staff are incredible! We drive from Auburn because the advice they give is worth it to us. We were especially impressed with the guidance on feeding and sleeping schedules they give for newborns. They are always willing to take us on short notice for sick visits. Facility is also great with unisex bathrooms and private nursing room available. A special shout out to Shanna and Becca for always talking great care of us!

name: Lam Jam
text: They've treated my children for 14 years and no complaints.

name: Alyssa Mann
text: Brandi, the Nurse Practitioner, has been excellent with my little boy! She’s always so nice and explains everything so well! We love her and have loved all the other doctors we’ve seen as well. Would recommend them to anyone.

name: Lennon Learning
text: Best pediatric office in Montgomery! Dr. Trumbull is the best!!!

name: Sree Sanoj
text: Visited here 3-4 times so far and Dr. Sadler was so friendly and descriptive about things, asks things and clarifies us well. I haven't faced very much wait times, rather its normal everywhere. Neat and clean location and staffs are also professional. Highly recommended pediatric care.

name: Luke Morrison
text: Amazing, compassionate doctors who have taken incredible care of the children of Montgomery for so many years.

name: Summer Cooley
text: Dr Richards is the best dr she was great with my kids she answered every question I had and we didn’t have to wait long I would recommend her to anyone she is genuine and very sweet to kids they didn’t even want to leave..

name: Toni Sitz
text: The doctors at this office are excellent.  I especially love Simon and Glover, however, the office staff is so diificult to work with.  They never make you feel welcome.  They are rude, never smile and make you feel like your bothering them.  They are very unwilling to work with you financially too.  My daughter was hospitalized and I owed a $100 balance from that and they tried to refuse to see my other daughter for a well check up when she was 3 months old for her shots until the balance was paid (and I didn't even know I owed that balance until I took my infant in for her 3 month visit). The staff are very unprofessional to say the least.  I've almost switched pediatricians several times, but I love Dr. Simon so much.

name: Jennifer Burr
text: Dr. Trumbull and staff are terrific, and I've been very sad to move away and find a new pediatrician. I've loved having my child as a patient here.

name: Alyssa H
text: The staff and doctors here could not be anymore friendly.  Every phone call and visit has been extremely pleasant and the nurses and doctors are phenomenal.  Would recommend to anyone with heart issues!

name: Kate Ferguson
text: Wonderful people! Great front office staff, great nurses and great doctors!!! I'm thankful to say we only had to visit once but I would gladly put my trust in them long term!!

name: Tonya Bigham
text: This photo is wrong. Google maps lead us to this building which was incorrect.

name: Jeff Schulmerich
text: This is the place to go if your child has heart defects. They are the best there is and you will not find any more skilled in there profession. What a wonderful experience in such a tragic situation.

name: Chris Sims
text: The most amazing people you will ever meet work here.

name: Wanda Monti
text: This place is awesome with children. Hearing and Speach is where we were at but it is also Occupational therapy and Physical therapy. Great place highly recommend it.

name: Madison Leonard
text: I was set to Children's Hospital and they helped me both times I was sent. I wish I could reach out to all of the people that helped me there because they really helped me. They kept me out of trouble so I could go home. I definitely recommend it but, not for me. The helped me alot which is why i'm not going back.

name: Jenny Stabile
text: Hands down the nicest people! The facility is clean and they are so good with children.

name: Jessica Sumerlin
text: My child was here for 10 months doing occupational therapy twice a week, weekly, or biweekly. The staff and our therapist were always the nicest people ! There was no wait. The facility is very clean.

name: Michelle Mitchell
text: Everyone is very caring. They are the best! It's effortless for them to genuinely want to see the best in your child. They are comforting and encouraging when, I (as the parent)wanted to give up. I wouldn't go anywhere else.

name: John Williams
text: I love here i just been here 2 days in i love the nurses n doctors doing good for kedrick Mitchell Jr

name: Coco Foster
text: When my daughter and I first started going in 2009 the people was real loving and considerate. Now it seems as if they dont care and I'm talking about the staff not the doctors the doctors are wonderful. It is the staff thats rude and inconsiderate.

name: Larry Abney
text: The people here are so nice and they love the kids. Carrie Doshcer and jesslynn Faught are really wonderful.  Carrie helped my son to walk. My son loves them both slot.

name: Anquenetta Mcadams
text: Erin Obed is the best

name: Stacey Odegard
text: Dr. Harrell has seen my boys since they both came in to the world and has always been excellent with them both. He makes you feel like family and shows great concern for each individual patient. The staff is excellent as well. His nurse, Jennifer, is great, upbeat, and always on her game. She is excellent with the kids as well and they make a great team. Never had an unsatisfactory visit in 13 years. Thank you so much for all that you do!

name: J Cassady
text: Dr. Harrell is an excellent pediatrician!!! He has been my sons doctor for the last ten years and has seen him through coughs, colds, asthma, pneumonia, and both major and minor surgeries!!! My son is very comfortable with him and he takes time to talk with us at every visit. He is a good christian man with a beautiful family and I would recommend him to anyone needing a pediatrician!

name: Charybdis ¿?
text: I absolutely love him. So kind and understanding.  Both my boys love him.

name: Patrick Nicholson
text: Dr. Does a thorough job. OFFICE STAFF STINKS. They like to overbook and try to herd as many people in as possible and make You wait for there mistakes.

name: Diana Light
text: Dr. Parmer has been our family pediatrician for 17 years. Since my husband is a doctor and can handle the boring stuff at home, we only bring wacky problems to Dr. Parmer's attention. He has treated hand burns on a baby, cold water induced rashes, a newborn with urinary tract reflux, a rusty screw in the foot, football pad eczema, a knee wound growing e coli and more.  (Fortunately these were spread out over time and four children!) Dr. Parmer handled all these things like it was no problem. If you catch him when he's accepting new patients, consider yourself blessed.

name: Botboy Memes
text: He is the best doctor and at 16years old I love to go in and talk to dr.parmer about soccer. He makes me feel comfortable and is very fun to be around. I can tell he loves what he does. He saved my life at a very young age and will always appreciate him!

name: Kayla Gillespie
text: Dr Parmer and his staff are the absolute best! They have taken great care of us for the last 7 years and we look forward to continuing with their practice! They always have worked us in when they are sick. He takes his time to answer all my questions and unfortunately for him I am a nurse and always have a lot of questions for him. He is never curt or short! :) I pray he practices as long as my children need to see a pediatrician! I would recommend him and his practice to anyone!

name: Aleah Mason
text: Dr. Yoder and his staff are exceptional. My child is Autistic with multiple health conditions requiring lots of care. They truly care about your child's well being and needs. You never have to wait to see the doctor. They are always helpful when you call or have any needs. Dr. Yoder is wonderful. I honestly can say he is the best pediatrician in Mobile. I truly feel blessed to have found him and his staff for my son's care.

name: Sherria Davis
text: Very compassionate doctor.very much on point with my grandkids.very focused doctor.

name: Dorothy Sloan
text:
Best pediatrician in town. I've taken my children to him for years since they were born  and now he is  my granddaughter's pediatrician.  I am very pleased with his services.
Great staff and they've been there since I've been going there so that speaks volumes. Never had a problem scheduling appointments or doing a walk in. Never a long wait time.
I would recommend him .

name: Amanda Skelton
text: I'd give zero stars if I could! I took my newborn in several times and called on-call for Dr. Yoder several times and he kept telling me that his colic, screaming/crying out in pain all day and all night was normal. I suspected reflux but he said he wouldn't prescribe anything unless he was losing weight. He never even tried to figure out what was wrong. So I got a second opinion somewhere else and he has a cow's milk allergy and severe reflux! She switched his formula to hypoallergenic and prescribed him Zantac immediately. He was a different baby. He's so much happier now and no longer screams in pain. His quality of life is better. Yet, Dr. Yoder never even heard what I had to say. I know my baby! He's a terrible pediatrician! Do not recommend!

name: Kristin Rogers
text: My child was going to this doctor from newborn to one year’s old. Dr. Yoder never took the time to actually examine any concerns I had with my child, instead he just went off what the nurses and PA said. I took my child to him for three months straight because her hair was coming and all he would say is that it’s normal baby hair while it was coming out in patches. On the third visit for her hair he finally decided to say it was eczema. I took my child to a different doctor and come to find out she had a fungus infection on her scalp that required medicated shampoo as well as an oral medicine to cure the fungus. Since Dr. Yoder did not take the time to look at her hair and scalp, it caused all of her hair to fall out.

name: Stephanie McMillan
text: Dr Yoder and his staff are wonderful! I have been taking my children there for almost 15 years. I tink he's a great physician

name: Hannah S
text: So glad he is our pediatrician. He really knows how to make you feel as ease about any of your worries or concerns and truly cares about you and your children

name: Jayda Tolbert
text: He can't help with tonsil stones. He lets kids with asthma leave when they have a 'common cold' until that little cough flares an asthma attack. Now in the hospital because he didn't do his job right the first time. -very opinionated angry 17 year old.

name: Nikeland Nichols
text: The Dr.'s and staff are fantastic!

name: Shalandra Blanks
text: Great!

name: Glynn Dykes
text: Thanks Dr Yoder for everything

name: Krystal Ellis
text: I recently just moved from Texas to Alabama came across caring for kids!?? Tonya privott old lady at front desk very unprofessional! App was at 1115 we sat my children(4) and I ages 10 down to 3 for hour and half she deliberately put people ahead of us we asked her if she log us in as here she stated everyone will be seen ..make matters worst EVERYONE that came in after me went ahead of me so at that point I was upset it 12pm at this time when I approached the counter she looked at me and said you gotta find somewhere else to go cause she got our time wrong she lied said our app is a1 145 clearing you didn't even look first time terrible place Nd there roaches in the lobby ..DISCRIMINATING at it finest

name: Shikisha Staton
text: I’m trying my hardest to find my kids another doctors office it’s not the doctor its the staff… the lady at the front office told me even if I’m here early and the people that have apts came before me they go first so I’ve been sitting here for almost a whole 35 minutes people that came in at least 15-20 min after me (LATE) is getting called because she is requesting them to get called! And all i need is a check up! We all in here complaining

name: FerraClaw FC
text: This doctor has taken care of me since I was 10 years old, I absolutely recommend Caring For Kids for anyone with children.

name: Shanice Nicole
text: This doctor is excellent my boys have been going here for years. And the staff is great with the exception of the lady at the front desk with the low hair cut. She has a bad i dont want to help attitude and im so annoyed with it that im going to find a new doctor she scheduled my appointment over the phone then when i get there for appt the next day she is telling me that i dont have one. When i asked to reschedule she proceeded to tell me that i had only been there 7 minutes 😤 and this is also after she began calling people that came in long after me to the back i even came in early for the appointment to ensure i could get out of there in time to make it to work on schedule. She has caused unecessary trouble with me today and i wont allow her negative energy to rub off on me but i will make it know that a attitude adjustment would be nice. She is the first person that you will encounter in this office and with all the time ive wasted having both of my children miss school, being late to work, and dealing with her negativety i wouldnt say its worth it. Again dr privot is a great doctor but sometimes one person drags it all down

name: jessie hardison
text: I have been taking my son to caring for kids since He was  Baby, he is now 18teen YEARS old Dr provitt  is a wonderful Dr, he has been a Big Blessing to me and my son, By caring so much about his well being, and my son's  health, he always takes time when ever my son has an appointment, and always concern  about us both.that says a hole lot about his character  and being a very good Dr.to my son I would not take my son no place else.dont no what I'll do when he reaches the age of 21.my son has Autism. And it makes  a huge difference  to me as to who looks out for his health and well being,  Dr provitt  has done just that.if you searching for a great caring Dr for your child, take them to caring for kids.because they stand behind their name.Great staff as well.

name: Nigeria Boston
text: The receptionist is not friendly, very slow and she had on house shoes. Our room smelled like a restroom and it seems like no one was on one accord. I asked for my son's shot record and that was $5 lol really? O would not recommend this place.

name: Chloe Jane Mitchell
text: Great doctor. The staff doesn’t seem to know what they’re doing... God willing, I hope the best for Central Pediatrics. But I walked out of there today (and it felt really good!!!) due to inconsiderate scheduling. They could really help patients by being a little more considerate. Like listening to all of the patients questions or giving courtesy calls... Hope the best for them.

name: Tigglies SirTigglebops
text: Called to set a one year appointment and was told they wouldn't wear masks during a pandemic. Was very disappointed. Called back a month later and they still are not wearing masks or face coverings. Had to change doctors.*edit called and talked to the nurse, the front was just rude and seemed not to care if we switch due to them not wearing masks. Nurse said she would gladly wear one.

name: Merf The Mermaid
text: Staff was very rude, the doctor didn't spend anytime with my son (The nurse spent more time with him then the actual doctor.), and lastly, we had an appointment for this past Friday. We were less then 10 minutes late when I had called earlier that day stating I was going to be late, the front desk just said ok and hung up. I brought my mother in law, and it said the office was closed. They apparently left EARLY when they knew we were going to be late. NOT recommended

name: Sam Gardner
text: I have been taking my kids to Dr. Crowell since he set up shop in Athens because at the previous office, my kids didn't see the same doctor twice, and it felt like they were just a number. Dr. Crowell and his staff know my children and their history. He's quick, knowledgeable, and perhaps most importantly for a pediatrician, he's personable. My kids love him. Audrey is fantastic as well. The office is clean, the staff is super friendly, and I'm confident my children are cared for.

name: Sabrina Kyle
text: Dr. Crowell and Audrey take very good care of my three children. I wouldn't want them to see anyone else.

name: Valerie Culver
text: They are very rude, and the people in the front are rude, my daughter has strep throat and they wouldn't even give her a doctor's excuse due to the Athens City schools rules about the kids missing school while sick,  they need to do a better job, and show more compassion to others that are sick, they are only there for the money not for caring about others someone needs to report them. If I had the number I would.jm thinking about finding another doctor.

name: Raqueal Hughes
text: I've spent the last month using all of my work breaks calling insurance companies to refile claims this pediatrician failed to notify me of for over a year. In fact, I was not informed of a $500+ bill due until I called to schedule my 2 year old for a sick visit. Then they proceeded to some how blame us for the filing mistake and threatened us with collections without ever sending us a bill or calling us. My insurance is happy to refile and pay for it and have assured me the doctor's office was completely liable. The care is not worth the billing staff incompetence.

name: Jamie Jordan
text: They've always taken good care of my kids and have always gotten them in quickly.

name: Amber Alexander
text: Please update your hours of operation online what is listed is incorrect. Thank you.

name: Richard Horton
text:
🙏💖😇👍FOR ME:  IN EVERY WAY PERFECT!
THANK YOU FOR ALL YOU DO!

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words Mr. Horton!

name: Kesha Williams
text: Jan is AMAZING!!! Goes above the call of duty to ensure the patient gets what is appropriate. Thank You Staff At Hinkle Pharmacy.

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words Kesha!!

name: Kimberly McNair
text: You won't find a pharmacy who cares more or goes out of their way farther to help you and take care of you than Hinkle Pharmacy! I can't say enough how many times they have gone above and beyond what is required and what, unfortunately, we have come to expect from most pharmacies. I highly recommend this pharmacy to everyone I know!!!!

name: Mandy McDonald
text: Very quick and efficient... and they are one of the only pharmacies in Birmingham area that has Tamiflu, they are compounding it in house.  Good looking out Hinkle and thanks for your service to the community.

name: Jacqi Robinson
text: I am so thankful for the nice lady who helped me today at Hinkle pharmacy. I work nearly every day and got by my grandparents today on one of my 2 days off this month to help him since he had just had surgery and he tells me he needs his inhaler re-fill. I go straight to hinkle and the gate is down and I notice they close at 1pm (its 1:20pm) so I drive to the window to look at their hours and a nice lady opens the gate and window and ask how she can help. I proceed to tell her I was looking to see when I needed to get someone to come back for his prescription and she says she can help me and she proceeded to fill my granddad's prescription for me..I cannot tell you how much this meant to me, I care for my grandparents as much as I am able to and for her to go out of her way she has no idea how much she helped me today! I honestly would not have been able to make it back for weeks to get his prescription. I was in tears and am so grateful! Thank you hinkle pharmacy!

name: Danna Marsh
text: I've only used Hinkle's once and I had a wondeful experience. I'd recommend this pharmacy to anyone in the local area. Very fast and nice employees.

name: David S. (Henderson)
text: My wife recently had 2  terrible experiences with this pharmacy. Not only was the service terrible but the overall attitude of the place was awful. The icing on the cake was when my wife reached out her hand to receive her change it was put on the counter instead. Will not fill any prescriptions there ever again!!!!!!

name: Cindy Seagle
text:
Helpful and friendly and on top of things
Convenient location

name: Tanya Chandler
text: I have been with this place since I wore diapers myself. They are family because they truely care to hear what's going on with your child and thats all a young mother wants. I highly recommend. I put all faith and trust in this office with my 3 children.

resp.text: What a gracious review, Tanya! We couldn't ask for anything more than the trust you've placed in our office. Thank you for allowing us to be part of your family!

name: Amber Fleming
text: We have seen Dr. Ashley, Dr. Germanson, and Dr. Adams and all have been fantastic! We saw Dr Adams today- he was so patient, calm, and kind with our shy one...even got a few smiles and words out of her. Each visit, I have felt like my concerns were addressed and like my child wasn’t just a number in the line up of kids for the day. Anna who works with appointments has always been super nice and helpful too! It’s so easy to have a bad attitude with covid, lots of sick kids, masks, etc. but the patience & kindness mean a lot to us! Thank you SE Peds for your consistent hard work!

resp.text: Thank you, Amber!

name: Ashley C
text: This is by far one of the best Pediatricians I have taken my daughter to. They are clean, caring and tourough i highly recommend southeastern.

name: kacie conner
text: Dr Adams and his nurse (Kim) go above and beyond to care for their patients! The lady at the desk when checking in (Veronica) she has the best attitude and is very caring! I will never take my children to another office.

name: James Tucker
text: This is the best ped in town. All the doctors are great.very good with kids and very thorough.

name: Mr and Mrs B.
text:
We love Dr. Morris! The ladies up front are very nice and helpful! The nurses are kind
And patient with the children.

name: Sierra Goff
text: We really love Dr. Morris and Dr. Gatlin but the complete staff is always great and we never really have to wait long!

name: Katie Smith
text: I love this practice & always find it to be clean w/ a staff that's always quite friendly even on busy days. The Dr.'s are all wonderful but my favorite is Dr. Adams. The staff & Dr.'s all seem to like their job & oh they never rush you & the Dr.'s take their time answering any & every question you may have. I recommend this practice & know that you won't be disappointed!! And the wait time on average is 10-15 minutes at most!!

name: Jessica Hicks
text: Love this group of doctors! They seem genuinely concerned about my boys and they don't mind sitting with you a few minutes to listen to you! We've never had to wait for an appointment and 90% of the time we get to see the same doctor!

name: Krystal Summers
text: Both of my kids have been patients here since birth! Both kids always want to see Dr. Adams. One is 12 and the other is on her last year as a patient here because she is turning 18. Great group of doctors!

name: Stephen Helms
text: My son has been a patient at South eastern pediatrics since day 1 and he is 12 now, we always get top shelf treatment and never wait long, we normally see Dr. Morris but we've seen every doctor there and got excellent treatment from them as well, I'm very happy with all of the staff !!! Never been disappointed

name: Meems
text:
We just moved to Alabama from Michigan.  My daughters first appointment to establish her as a new patient went relatively smooth.  Not much interaction from the Dr., but not much needed either.  Staff was relatively friendly.  Fast forward to next visit, (scheduled for dermatology issues) went to check in window... was not greeted at all by any of the 5 staff members...clipboard was thrown in my direction...no instruction, no greeting, no interaction with me whatsoever. They continued their conversations, jokes ect, as if no one else existed.
As an administrative healthcare professional of 25 years, I have never witnessed such unprofessionalism and pure blatant disregard.  It's really a shame. I hope the staff manager addresses that issue!
Other than this incident, all others aspects of this practice were satisfactory. Waiting area and bathrooms are clean and neat.  Medical staff are prompt and efficient.

text: Love love love Dr. Morris! We never wait very long, even when we just walk in. Staff have been super nice and helpful.

text:
We've had the issues of SEVERAL of the doctors not taking me seriously but taking my husband seriously. I'm not sure if its because he's a man, because hes older than me or what but I stay home with our son so I'm the one who knows rhe answers to their questions.

We finally found two that will listen to me. Dr Gaitlin & dr Adams and I recommend them VERY highly!!

name: Emma Thompson
text: My grandson who is seven goes to this Pediatric clinic. He was diagnosed with ADHD and was prescribed Foxalin, which is Dexmethylphenidate. Its suppose to be a mild stimulant to the central nervous system that help control hyperactivity and impulse control. My grandson was only taking one dose in the morning to help him with hyperactivity and paying attention in school, his dosage was increase without proper assessment of the side effects of this controlled substance on a seven year old. After a day at the park with my grandson and my great nieces,while driving home my grandson tried to jump out of my car literally. I ran off the road while holden him with one hand hanging out my car and trying to whole the steering wheel with the other while my nieces yelled,we all could have been killed. When I did get off the road safely and got him back in the car he was asking me was I real,and was his cousins real. His heart was beating so fast I could see it through his shirt. When me and my daughter took him to Southeastern Pediatric to see his doctor she didn't seem to be concerned at all by this horrible event that me and my grandson and my nieces had experience. Her lack of sympathy or empathy for what had happen with my grandson due to the side effects of a controlled substance that she prescribed to a seven year old is beyond my comprehension. My grandsandson may just be another patient to her, but he means the world to me. I still think about what could have happen that day if I had lost my grip and he had fallen out my car. I give all my thinks to the Lord for saving me my grandson and my nieces, it's only by his Grace we are alive. My grandson is no longer on Focalin, and if I have anything to say about it he will never be put on another ADHD med. Please do your own research before you put your child on any medications that has these kind of side effects so you want have to go through the horror of what I experience.

The $70.00 dollars that I pay per appointment is twice the amount that I paid in Mobile Al. I believe that I will try a Real Doctors office that care more about patients then their bottom line

The wait wasn't long at all (I'd filled most of the paperwork out online) and the staff was polite and very efficient. I hope all of my future visits will be as positive as the first one. name: VONDA “QUEEN OF FORD” BOLDEN
text: The only reason why I am rating them a 1 is simply because I can't give them a ZERO!!! Today was my grand daughter 1st appointment with this office... When her mother got there she was turned around because she didn't have ALABAMA Medicaid and has GA Medicaid... When she made the appointment the office was aware that she was just born in Columbus.... As a matter of fact... The Medical Center referred us to this office since its only down the street from my house... My grand daughter mother gets there and was told... "WE CAN'T SEE YOUR BABY WITHOUT A MEDICAL CARD"... and sent her on her way with a website to switch her medicaid over (which was the wrong web address) She called me and I asked did they even offer her to pay for the visit... she stated no however  she was going to turn around and go ask if I could pay with my card... They told her that it would cost 70.00... When I asked to speak to the young lady, (Amber or Amanda) she got on the phone and I asked how come they didn't give her an option to pay before she left.  This ______ said, "We don't see ANY PATIENTS without them paying upfront... I let her know that MONEY was a problem however you just don't send a baby however when in fact they are suppose to be seen soon after coming out of the hospital... She then gave my grand daughter mother the phone back without saying anything...  I then told my grand daughters mother to leave because at this point I felt like we were taking my PUPPY to a veterinarian and not my grand daughter to a pediatrician... To me they made us feel like she was an un-necessary animal that we just wanted and not what we needed.  We will now do business in Columbus and not even worry about this Pediatric Center... Amber/Amanda whatever her name was... SHOULD BE FIRED!!! She doesn't represent this office in a professional manner!!!
