text: I was a new patient at the clinic coming from Atlanta,Ga. with multiple health issues. I have never seen the doctor that was on my medicaid only this P.A. In the beginning Amanda was polite but she later changed after Dr Berryman gave me two injections when I was suppose to have a total of  three injections in three different locations to help ease my pain. The second injections didn't go so well.I wasn't able to complete the three injections.(my right hip,lower back then the left hip) the areas were inflamed. I was in so much pain i couldn't walk. And I had an up coming appt with Amanda. Because I wasn't able to keep my appt with her. She barred me away from all if the medical facilities associated with her... Bottom line if she can't get money from Al. Medicaid too then youre not allowed on the property. Hats off to Dr Berryman he's a caring doctor for his patiences...he's professional in what he does.

The back is too crowded, and unprofessional. Nurses everywhere but still slow. Really don’t feel like a doctors office at all. Not going back , changing my doctor. We set a high standard for ourselves and are truly sorry to hear that this standard was not met in your interaction with us. In an effort to resolve any issues that you may have had, someone from our office will be reaching out to you.

Thank you!

Cahaba Medical Care

name: Randy Calle
text: To have been injected with the conjecture of the Lord's grace manifested in the form of a Covid-19 vaccine was an absolute blessing to say the least. name: Meshia
text:
If I could have done this review without giving any stars, I would have. But, this star is for LaTory Franks. She really deserves all 5, but this review is not about her. Dr. Ashford has been my gynecologist for more than 10 years, so needless to say, I trusted him. He performed a surgery on me that in turned almost took my life, because he continued to diagnose me inaccurately from the pain I was having after the surgery. I ended up with sepsis, diverticulitis, and an ostomy bag. I have never had any marks on my body, not even my stomach, but after Dr. Ashford's surgery, my stomach looks like a train track with connect the dots around it. This sent me into a depressed state. I have to see this every day when I look at myself.
After which he had no remorse or concern for. He was always nice until he did something wrong. He acts as if he is some type of god with people lives in his hand. But, everyone has to answer to THE MOST HIGH GOD!! I would definitely not refer my worst enemy, let along family, friends, or associates to him or cahaba medical. Even after I did my grievance report concerning this issue, and was notified that his attorneys told him to contact me, to this day, nothing has been done, and, no one from cahaba medical has contacted me since, because they don't care either.

resp.text:
Thank you for providing your feedback and letting us know about this issue, Meshia. We set a high standard for ourselves and are truly sorry to hear that this standard was not met in your interaction with us. In an effort to resolve any issues that you may have had, someone from our office will be reaching out to you.

Thank you!

name: Kendall Durham
text: My husband and I pulled up to their after hours clinic right when it started (5:15). I called crying because we had never been there-but both my children were very sick and their pediatrician is in Chattanooga. I was told that “unfortunately” they did not have time to see my children (clinic did not end until 8:00). I took my children to Urgent Care for Children in Huntsville and they were phenomenal-both of my children had croup. We will NEVER try to go there again. Who turns away sick babies?

resp.text:
Kendall,

We sincerely apologize for your experience with our after-hours clinic, and hope your children feel better very soon .  Fort Payne Pediatrics prides itself on offering exceptional care to patients and top-notch customer service to both patients and their families, and we did not do our job on this day.  We take all feedback seriously and are fully investigating this matter to make sure to take the proper corrective actions and ensure this does not occur in our clinic again.  If you are willing and would like to share additional feedback, please feel free to contact me at rgoldin@fortpaynepeds.com.

name: The Energizer Mommy
text:
I had my daughter in Montgomery a week before I moved to Auburn. The doctor at the hospital there strongly recommended Pediatric Associates of Auburn to me, and I'm so glad I listened to him!
Dr. Anglin has been my daughter's pediatrician since she was born. 15 months later, I have to say I think we lucked out and got the best pediatrician in the area! It seems like everyone I meet also takes their children to her, and we all agree that she is just fabulous!
I've also had to take my daughter in for emergency visits on occasion, and each doctor in the clinic we've had the pleasure of seeing have been wonderful, too. The nurses and office staff are also very sweet and helpful. Not to mention their new facility is just gorgeous. I couldn't run out of good things to say about this practice. 👍👍

name: Rebecca
text: Please do not take your child here. They do not listen to the parents. They ENTIRE staff is beyond rude. Nobody ever smiles. Nobody is friendly. Very poorly managed. I gave them multiple chances and every time was a terrible experience.

name: Tiffaney Griffin
text: I wouldn't take my child any where else but here. They generally are concerned about what's going on and they probe me with questions to get more information that I didn't think was important but actually was. I highly recommend Dr. Anglin is the absolute best. She knows how to put things where I can understand them and she gives me recommendations and behind the scenes information and stats so I'm better prepared for cold or flu season.

name: Misty Roller
text: They staff and docs are so amazing. We are new but I can tell they're going to be great

name: Andou N. Jennifer
text: Calling to have an appointment is very unpleasant because of the receptionist. After making the phone call and talk to them, you don't want to go there anymore!

name: Ashley Cowart
text: The staff are all accommodating and sweet.

name: Tricia Harris
text: It’s sad as a nurse that health care has came to this for this office!!! All they care about is money!! My granddaughter use to go there and now I have had to get custody and moved to West Va. I signed a release for records at the new doctors office so they would make her an appt and they declined sending records because my daughter had owed a previous bill of $98 !! I told her I have taken on enough responsibility to have to be forced to pay an old bill my daughter didn’t take care of. And I informed her (the manager) that the new doctor can’t schedule an appt until records are received!!!  So they are with holding a CHILDS medical records  because of $$. Then said I could pay to fax them at $5 and $1 per page !! To fax records does not cost them anything the ink and paper will be out of the pocket of the receiver of the fax!!!

name: Sandy Brown
text: Dr Freeman and associates have seen our boys  since our boys were born. They have seen them through every sneeze and sniffle, every fever and infection for 14 years. We pray they will see them through 14 more

name: Rachel
text:
I started with this dr. Office when my daughter was born. She is now 10 years old. I started with dr. Stubblefield  and his nurse Erica. Both are absolutely wonderful and the reason I stayed so long. They care about your child interact with your child and really get to know your child. When Dr. Stubblefield left we stayed because of nurse Erica my baby loves her and the other staff although they treat you like “just another patient” they were “ok”. However my daughter medicaide expired the letter was sent to a old address I did not know until I was trying to make a appointment because she was sick. They actually refused to see her unless I payed cash up front. Now they know good and damn well medicaide would go back 3 months and pay that bill, if not bill me and I can pay it at a later date but at that time I just did not have it. Bottom line after 10 years you refuse my sick child over paperwork!!! Really???? They did not offer me any solution or try to work with me in any way they just did not care. So at this point it is time for us to move on and find a Dr. office that at least cares about their patients.

UPDATE
We got the medicaide taken care of and started the process to change her Dr. In the process she ended up getting sick again. I had to make an appointment with this Dr. office one last time because she was not currently a patient at the new Dr. office. While I was there I wanted to get her medical records to kinda speed the transfer process along. When the African American receptionist (sorry I don’t know her name) asked me what the problem was I explained. She was very apologetic and asked me if I could talk to I’m guessing the offer manager. She as well as the rest of the staff was apologetic and she informed me it is against their policy to refuse a sick child and she wish I had to talk to her when this was going on. So for now we will be staying because my baby did not want to leave nurse Erica. She says that is the only person she trust.

name: Jessica Kramer
text: We LOVE Dr. Royal & all the wonderful nurses!! The staff are always super friendly!!

name: B’s TV
text: The best pediatrics around the auburn area I highly recommend

name: k C
text: I tried to make an appointment for my daughter and the receptionist was very rude and unhelpful. We will be going elsewhere.

resp.text: So sorry you had that experience. My office manager would be glad to talk to you and help resolve the problem.

name: sofast04
text: Very compassionate and child friendly.

name: Jessica Barnes
text: Excellent staff of doctors and nurses !! For years my children have been going to see Dr. White and others and I have enjoyed the professional and experienced doctors anytime I’ve needed to take them. If you are looking for a place for your children I highly recommend this group!

name: Cowboys Fan
text: Awful service. Had an appointment for my son at 12. Multiple families went to the back. We arrived at 1150. I finally went to the desk at 1123 only to find out that my son was skipped over. The representatives reason was that she didnt see us sign in so she skipped my sons appointment. Lack of empathy and very nonchalant. Would not recommend.

name: Kourtney Dumas
text: Dr. Collins is distinguished. He didn't wash his hands and put his hards to my son's mouth. Then when speaking with the manager, she acted as if it was normal.

name: Patricia Griffin
text: My son has been a patient here for almost year and I was pleased with their service until today. Saturday morning, my son woke up with a sore throat so I called the office at 1030am to bring him in. The recording picked up stating the office is open from 815-12pm today for sick patients only. I got to the office at 1051am and the door was locked. After a few minutes, a parent opened the door and the receptionist said, "the door is locked because we are closed." I said your recording states you are open until 12pm. She said that doesn't matter we are still closed. I left the office and called the office number again. The recording also stated the on call doc was at Jackson Hospital so I called and they put through to the same office I was just standing in. They put the nurse on the phone and she told me to come back to the office for treatment. I am very displeased with this office and if I didn't work 40 hours a week, I would stand outside their office with a sign that says "Un-Professional Pediatrics! If you can find another office for your child, please do. Let this office be your last resort. The docs are nice but the front desk staff is awful and they set the atmosphere for your whole visit.

name: Carol Roberts
text: My 18-year-old daughter has been going to Dr. Drennen since she was born. Dr. White is also wonderful. We've always been able to count on this office to handle the little emergencies. The doctors are incredibly patient. Sometimes the wait is really long because they have to handle emergencies. If your doctor is tied up they can always let you see one if the others.

name: Denise Randall
text: I chose Professional Pediatrics when my son was born 2 years ago and now his baby brother is a patient.  Excellent doctors, nurses, and staff.  We love Dr. White!

name: S. Necole Suggs
text: I saw Dr. White as a child and now my daughter sees him! Even when she has to see other doctors I'm happy with the service! Great staff and nurses!

name: Travis McGough
text: My wife and I really like the doctors and nurses, but we have had some rude experiences with the office staff. The woman who answers the "Mom and Dad Line" can be particularly condescending. It has occurred enough times that we are considering changing pediatricians.

name: Amanda McDonald
text: Dr. Hoye is awesome!

name: Wanda Owen
text: I am fairly new to the clinic but have received excellent care at each appointment.  Everyone has been very kind and helpful.  I highly recommend this office and staff. Very professional and courteous.

name: Doris J
text: Love the light fixture and TV screen for estimated waiting time. They also provide free water and wifi. Very mindful and friendly medical practice. The entire staff is pleasant and helpful.  I always treated with a smile and my questions always get well explained.

name: Dennis Hines
text: I had a pleasant experience at Taylorville Family Medicine. Waiting area was clean and seating was appropriate for social distancing. Wait time was minimal, and staff were friendly and professional. My CRNP Kim Carver is great! She has the right blend of compassion and competence.

resp.text: Thank you for your review Dennis!

name: Al Brennan
text: I wanted to follow up my previous review concerning my experience with Taylorville Family medical. I have to say, the experience I received has been and I believe will be one of the best experience I will ever receive. The entire time I was there, from check in to examination and then my release, was over all,  a very good experience. They are truly very kind through my experience and I definitely will recommend them to anyone looking for a primary care physician and facility. I can’t thank them enough for their overall healthcare.

resp.text: Thank you for visiting and leaving a positive review Al! Yes, we pride ourselves on patient care and we appreciate your recommendation!

name: Tina Turley
text: I had hardly any wait time.  The nurses and technicians were quick but thorough.  It was a very positive experience.

resp.text: Thanks for visiting, we’re here if you ever need us Tina!

name: Gabrielle Myers
text: I really like Jodi and Dr. Burdette but i had a bad experience that was horrible. The financial lady embarrassed me in front of a full waiting room a while back instead of pulling me in an office or something. She was by no means quiet either. I will never recommend to anyone now.

resp.text: Thanks for the feedback Gabrielle! We apologize for the uncomfortable experience that you faced, we will look into it further.

name: Lillian Rogers
text:
If I could give this place less stars, I would. I have given this places multiple chances seeing as I have gone here since I was a kid. However, the NP laughed at me, belittled me, and embarrassed me during my last Pap smear.
I decided to give this place another chance a year later for a physical, I was transferred THREE times, repeated what I needed THREE times, and placed on hold for over 5 minutes. This place has gone downhill. Save your time & money.

resp.text: Thank you for being such a long term customer at TFM Lillian! I apologize for the inconvenience that has transpired, we will look into the issue further! Thanks for the feedback.

name: Rex Perkins
text:
I was a patient of Dr. Burdette's for over 10 years. A great doctor she is. However, she no longer owns TFM and it seems like the greedy corporation take over has ruin what was once a great doctor's office.

I showed to an appointment recently that was badly needed, as I had some concerns about me health including new issues. I had no prior contact with the office in any way before my appointment or was told nothing at previous visits. But money is what they wanted. I had no idea I had a bill, but the first thing they told me was "you can't be seen today" and then go on to tell me about the bill, which I offered to pay on, but I didn't have my cc with me at the time and offered to pay when I came back in a few days to get blood work results.

They gave their spiel about how doctors need to get paid too, and would I work without expecting to get paid, and blah blah blah. I' believe people deserve to get paid for good services. After all, I had been coming there for over 10 years and paid ever single bill prior, so why would anyone think I wouldn't pay this one. I've my own business before, I know it's important to get paid.  But shouldn't human decency and kindness be the first form of communication one starts with instead of the "I want my money first" attitude?

For me, I felt abandon by a doctor's office that I had been coming to for years. That I trusted my children with. I was given zero notice before being told I couldn't be seen. I was over due for certain treatments that I have to see the doctor or nurse to receive. I had concerns about my blood pressure and other issues that were important to prevent increased medical problems. I didn't want to hear their spew about "working for free" or we have to be paid to continue services, I wanted to hear. "Ok, what can we do to help you out? We're here for you." Treat people like this first I guarantee you will always get paid.

Or at the least I wanted the bare treatment until I had enough time to find another doctor for treatment, but I wasn't even given that. Yes, they offered to see me again, but made it clear I was going to have to jump through some hoops and pay, always with an emphasis on getting paid, never about what I thought doctors first priority was supposed to be: to do no harm an give their patients the best medical care they can ( not for free of course), but a good doctor put's people first. Dr. Burdette always did this, but this new corporation or whomever owns Taylorville Family Medicine now, IS ALL ABOUT THE MONEY AND COULDN'T CARE LESS ABOUT YOU. It's sad, and I foresee more year long patients leaving in time, as well. It's not the same anymore.

resp.text: Hey Rex thank you for taking the time to write us a review! Our payment policies have changed, but they are still ethical to our patients. Our patients are still atop our value hierarchy and always will be. Thanks again!

name: Molly Sanford
text: My middle child was seen last week and myself today. I absolutely love this practice. All the nurses and ladies behind the desk are so nice and informative. Everybody you see talks yoy through what is happening, what they are thinking, and what is going to happen. My other two children will be seen this Friday and my husband after that. I couldn't be happier that we made the switch.

resp.text: We are ecstatic that you are satisfied with our switch to Taylorville Molly! We have a very personable staff to connect with any patient that comes in. Thanks for leaving a detailed review!

name: Sheila Richard
text: I have been coming here for 2 years now. Just for annual check ups. Today, I got a chance to finally meet Dr. Burdette. She is amazing! So loving and caring towards her patients! She answered all my questions  and made sure that I had all I needed. If you are looking for a kind and a compassionate doctor she is definitely it.

name: Raymond Hendrix
text: Quick and easy rapid test.

resp.text: Thanks! If you ever have questions just message us Raymond!

name: Ishmael Rudolph
text: Great use of technology to speed up process.

resp.text: Yes, we pride ourselves on keeping up with modern trends. Thanks for visiting Ishmael!

name: Tammy Sawyer
text: The doctors and nurses are always polite and really care about answering your questions and helping you deal with the issues you are facing. They listen to what you have to say.

resp.text: Yes! Our doctors and nurses always put our patients first and we let our family take care of yours! We hope you enjoyed your time spent at Taylorville Tammy!

name: Francine Rodgers
text: For my very first appointment with you all I have to say you all were very thorough and helpful. I left out of the appointment knowing I made a very good decision in choosing you all.

resp.text: We are jubilant that your debut appointment went as smooth as possible. We hope you continue to have a pleasant experience with us. Thanks for the review Francine!

name: Yuanqin Holman
text: Good environment.  Reasonable waiting time.  Considerate nurses and practitioners.  Treatment for long term health benefits for patients.  Very pleasant experience.

name: Etta Richardson
text: I use to love this place I had the worse experience last week. I had an appointment and the day of they text to tell me I had a balance and I call while I was enroute to my appointment. So this guy said he was in management and had a very nasty attitude I had told them that I will pay something on it. He was very very Nasty.  I wish I would had gotten his name because he would be put on blast.

resp.text: We are very clear about our payment policy. Imagine a boss refusing to give a paycheck to an employee for the hours that the employee put into his job. That's how physician's offices feel when they do not get paid for their work.  Past Due payment is due before new credit is extended.

name: Laura Williams
text: The front office staff is wonderful. Elizabeth was very professional and I was seen in a timely manner. The NP Kim was very kind and attentive. Also last but not least Dr. Burdette's care and bedside manner was remarkable. I would highly recommend this facility.

name: Kim Drish
text: I absolutely love this doctors office. The staff are very warm and welcoming. The Nurse Practitioners are very concerned about what is going on with you. I like them all. I am glad my friend told me about them.

name: 2wonderful2u
text: Based on the staffs  response to the negative reviews, I can see this is not a very professional staff. Nor are they interested in correcting their wrongs, as they feel they have no wrongs. I definitely will not be a new patient.

resp.text: Thankfully you are free to choose another office.

name: fanchu meng
text: Dr. Burdette is very sweet and she takes good care of her patients. Her staff are so friendly and professional. The nurse practitioner Jodi is awesome! It's such a blessing to be her patient and I recommend Taylorville Family Medicine to everyone.

name: Susan Looney
text: Everything is very professional and I highly approve of their service.

resp.text: Yes, we pride ourselves on professionalism and we highly value your stamp of approval Susan. Thanks for visiting!

name: A Fondren
text: Don’t waste your time. What a joke. Got there to my doctors appointment at 9:45 and my appointment wasn’t til 10. I didn’t get to be seen til 11:25! I had to go the the receptionist to see if Dr. Burdette was behind. Long story short. She only sees two patients and with 15 minute delays. 😑. Seriously! Only because they only have a few rooms. Not my problem! Maybe they need to get a better place with more rooms instead of 4 or even put a sign up saying “you will wait at least an hour or more for your visit”. I wished I knew that before I even became a new patient or I wouldn’t even waste my time....finding a new doctor. 👋🏻

resp.text: The information you are sharing is incorrect, but due to HIPAA we will not be able to comment further.  We appreciate you giving our practice an opportunity to provide you medical care.  We also realize that not every patient and practice is a match, this being one of those cases.  We wish you the best of luck finding a primary care physician who can meet all of your expectations with NO wait time.  Good Luck.

name: C Davis
text: My family and I have had several bad experiences here. Some of the examples are being misdiagnosed, not being told about potential issues in the blood work that was done, and waiting for extended periods of time to see the a nurse practitioner when the waiting area was nearly empty. To top all of that, they have even sent us bills on different occasions for things that had already been paid! I would give this office a 0 star rating if possible. If for some reason you choose to use them, keep your receipts!

name: Marcy Weinberger
text: Dr. Burdette is an excellent physician, in my opinion. She is careful, comprehensive and purposeful in her assessment and treatment of me without wasting my time or healthcare dollars on unnecessary tests and procedures. She and her staff also are very kind and listen carefully to my concerns. Finally, she provides referrals to talented specialists when appropriate. I have been a patient of hers for about two decades and I hope she never retires! BTW, I have never had to wait an excessive amount of time in the waiting room.

name: Tammy Plowman
text: The staff is always friendly and helpful . They work with you to see a doctor even when you don’t have an appointment . Shout outs to Tonyia Jones and Kimberly Carver

name: Kayle Vaught
text: Mikayla or whatever her name is, is so rude. Do not waste your time here. I will be reporting to HR and corporate about how unprofessional she is.

resp.text: We apologize for such a response. We have been attempting to reach you but it seems that you are NOT a patient with our practice.  If you could please contact our office about this review since we are getting conflicting information.

name: Cristal Robertson
text: I've used Dr. Burdette for years and have been treated great by all staff members

name: Rebecca Cowan
text: I have used Dr. Burdette for years and I have always been completely satisfied with my visits. However, she now takes same day sick walk-in visits and I am over the moon excited!! Last week, I was walking around the UA campus.....looking for some fun, of course.....and I tripped over a curb and landed on all fours. You can imagine my embarrassment....bent over on all fours looking up at a sweet, blue-eyed gentleman, asking if I was ok. Well, I wasn't ok, but this lady was not going to let him see my pain as he hoisted me up off my knees, then had to unbend my back as it popped and groaned at him. As soon as I could get back to my car, I drove straight to see Dr. Burdette. Well, as I walked in the door, the sweet receptionist, Elizabeth, quickly helped me and didn't even laugh at my humiliating story. I was in and out from seeing Dr. Burdette in no time at all. Thank you, Elizabeth and Dr. Burdette!!

name: Donna Tittle
text: I was a mess medically when I moved here over 8 years ago and since then with Doctor Burdette and her staff, I now can move, breathe and have a chance of a longer happier life.Thanks for all your hard work. If you need the best. Here's your answer.

name: clara hostetter
text: The staff is VERY rude, won’t call you back!!! Don’t waste your time, not a place to trust your health care.

resp.text: Hi "clara",  we would have loved the opportunity to have discussed this issue before such a negative public rating.  We will be more than happy to forward your medical records to the physician of your choice, if you will call our office and identify yourself.

name: Hunter Standridge
text: Rude staff

resp.text: We appreciate your feedback Hunter! That is definitely an area we are continuously improving

name: S C
text: I have used Dr. Burdette for several years after my primary physician passed away. Today I had an appointment scheduled with her that I had been waiting months for, my appointment was at 3:15pm at 3:00pm I received a text that said they were running behind and my new appointment time would be at 3:31pm and that they would text me again before my appointment to confirm. At 3:30pm I received the same text. I went ahead to the appointment because I needed to be seen and I would just wait in my car. When I went in and checked with the receptionist she told me that I was 45 minutes late and that they would have to reschedule my appointment. I showed her the texts and she said that they only sent the one text that was generated when I did not show up for my appointment at 3:15pm. THIS IS COMPLETELY UNTRUE!!!!  I was very upset, she told me that it would throw them completely behind to try and see me and that she talked to the owner and he said that I would have to reschedule. There was absolutely no one in the waiting room. While telling me this a woman walked in and said are you still open? She said yes and checked her in for bloodwork. But they can’t admit their mistakes when it comes to texts that cause problems and let me be seen. They then sent one of the medical assistants out to talk to me. He was VERY RUDE AND CONDESCENDING, after telling me that I should have come and checked in at my appointment time he went on to tell me that he was always at least 15 minutes early for ever appointment he has ever scheduled. When I told him that was foolish for me to come and sit in a reception area for an undetermined amount of time in the middle of a pandemic-he told me I could have waited in my car. When I told him that I was working and felt that was ridiculous he told me that he was a single parent to 2 children whose mother had died and that he had to be both parents to his children and still keep his appointments and go to work everyday to support them. This all in a raised voice that apparently carried. When he finally stopped his tirade, or I could have possibly interrupted him to tell him that my husband passed away in 2012 and that I also have 2 children that I have had to raise myself while working and keeping appointments and yes I raised my voice too. At that point, the nursing staff came out and told me to leave and that the owner would call me. That I was upsetting the patients in the office. Really??? I have always been at my appointments, I have watched this office deteriorate over the last couple of years, I like Dr Burdette but it is clear from all the things that have happened and from the way they have treated me (and others if you read the google reviews and not all the five star reviews they have on there site which I am positive they solicit and approve) that Dr Burdette has absolutely no control over what happens with her patients. I am certain that the owner will never call me and if he does it will probably be to tell me not to come back. Which he doesn’t need to do because I will not be treated like that and will find another doctor. One that actually cares about the needs of their patients and does not treat them like they treated me today. I am extremely disappointed in Dr Burdette, I feel like after 10 years she should have at the very least - have talked to me herself, but she did not, I feel very sad that she cared so little for me as her patient but I guess I just misjudged her as well. This is not the first problem I have had with them but it will be the last. The NP’s there miss a lot of things and you almost never see Dr Burdette unless you specifically ask to and then things like this happen. I expect them to not release my records without a fight also. Please think before you make an appointment here and please don’t put yourself in risk if you feel that you are not getting the care you need and deserve at this or any of their clinics. I will be reporting all of what happened to me today to my insurance company and to the state medical board. No one should be treated this way - ever!!

resp.text: Thank you for visiting and leaving a review detailing your experience SC! We are continuously improving all of our protocols and procedures regarding issues like these to make them obsolete. This occurrence seems to be an anomaly and we will be stay cognizant of such situations. Again, thanks for your review and our apologies for what has transpired.

name: Marcie Wood
text: Dr Burdette is Wonderful

name: Holly Ha†cher
text: Love them all very nice!

name: Robert Rakowski
text:
(Translated by Google) Good tests, I recommend: D

(Original)
Dobre testy, polecam :D

name: Dorian Gonzalez
text:
(Translated by Google) Good attention, very friendly, clean and comfortable environment, 100% recommended

(Original)
Buena atención, muy amables, ambiente limpio y confortable, 100% recomendado

name: Mary Hill
text: Dr. Gene Cheng and Dr. Siridao Cheng are both AMAZING with my boys. They really care about the kids and will go to great lengths to make sure they are okay and get to feeling better. I started using them at first because they took Medicaid and I stayed with them after getting insurance through work because my boys, my husband, and I love them so much. I wouldn’t want to take my kids anywhere else.

name: Alisha McClain
text: I love Dr. Chang and his wife I been going to them since I been a child but, the nurses there are very rude and not kid friendly for it to be a pediatrician office. People go where there children feel the most comfortable. Tina has an attitude and the other nurse has no personality at all just stares at you.

name: Monster Babe
text: I wouldn't take my kids anywhere else. I love Dr. S Cheng. She is wonderful. Sheri in the front office is amazing. Tina is amazing. Jessica is amazing. Everyone else is kinda meh.

name: a pittm
text: The drs themselves are great. Office Staff, not so much. Also takes over a month to get an appointment for a check-up. So, if you plan on going here, call a month in advance for appointment.

name: Al Terry
text:
I have been bringing my children To this physician's office for alot of years and when they were in the office today on the 3 rd day of April for sinus problems bad allergies and couple more issues they have a low immune systems and get sick easily which is something they can't help nor can I.
I have not had a whole lot of problems until this certain visit what was especially aggravating was how me and my two girls were treated by the nurse she was rude interrupting a lot, more or less telling my oldest child to hush because it was about her if that is the kind of patient service we're going to get I will look elsewhere for another pediatrician office. Just thoughts parents should know this.

Thanks,

Concerned parent !!!!!!!!!.

name: Tiff Cox
text: There rude and don't have a clue what there doing..

name: Moni Ahmad
text: We love Dr. Lotfy & her staff, she’s been seeing our kids since they were very small (over a decade)! Always so caring, compassionate, and sound medical judgment. Feel very grateful to have someone I can always call on & trust with the care of my kiddos. Thanks !!

name: vkutz
text: Dr. Akram Haggag is absolutely terrific. Kind, compassionate, extremely intelligent... one of the greatest doctors that I have seen. The office staff is very kind and accommodating. The office space is clean, modern and comfortable.

resp.text: Thank you for your kind review!

name: Tracee Townsend
text: My daughter has seen Dr. Lotfy and her nurse practitioner for all her pediatric needs since she was born. We are very pleased with the pediatric care they provide. I also see Jared Connor, the adult side nurse practitioner and I am always very pleased with his work up and treatment. They do have some phone hold times typically but totally worth the wait, as they are a busy practice.

name: Brooke Boehme
text: Be sure that your health insurance will cover lab work before you have it done. They knew my insurance would not cover it and did not notify me. Never had an issue before with my insurance covering blood work, and was unfortunately not notified even though they knew.

name: Will Weiland
text: They are awesome and always take great care.

name: Christina Mathews
text: Dr. Haggag and his nurse practitioner Jared Connor are awesome providers. They are always willing to listen and order test needed to treat. I highly recommend valley internal medicine and pediatrics.

name: Debbie Nicholas
text: I see Dr. Haggag and his NP Jared Connor. I highly recommend both of them. I went to Decatur ER multiple times and was miss diagnosed and seen Jared Connor and was immediately diagnosed and sent to Crestwood ER.  I continue to follow with them both and very please with my treatment.

name: Sophia Rowe
text: This is a family practice. We have been with Dr. Lotfy, the pediatrician in the practice, for 10 years. We switched from another office to follow her as our physician. Very experienced, professional, compassionate and knowledgable. If you need peace of mind, this is the doctor who will address and spot anything wrong. Your children and you will be listened to, tests will be ordered, all problems will be followed up with, etc. We are lucky to have her as our doctor. Her staff is very nice and professional too!

resp.text: Thank you for you kind review. We strive to provide the best care!

name: Mary Robinson
text:
The supporting staff is severely lacking in professionalism. A few months ago I was stuck in a game of "phone tag" to reschedule an appointment, because the office has never answered the phone when I called. I eventually had to go out of my way to visit to reschedule the appointment.

More recently, I changed insurance providers and provided the staff with my new insurance card. I witnessed them copy the card, and as they returned the card, I was assured it would be provided to billing. Today I was notified by my previous insurance provider that my appointment was claimed on my expired contract. They close at noon on Friday's, so there is nothing I can do until Monday morning. I expect this event to unfold in a similar "phone tag" manner. I will provide updates.

Update: They answered my billing call on the first try and resolved the issue in a timely manner. I'll give them one more star for that (up from 2).

resp.text:
We are sorry you had this experience with our office. I will discuss this with our staff. However, we are suite A, Valley Internal Medicine and Pediatrics and we do not close at noon on Fridays. We do take a lunch from 12-1 daily.
Thank you for your review.

name: Cristie Clark
text: We really got lucky when we found Valley Internal Medicine and Pediatrics. We absolutely love Dr Lotfy and Heidi... and the office staff/nurses have always been super friendly and helpful. They have always taken time with our twins and patiently listened to our concerns. We have never felt rushed or like we were just another folder. They know the story of our boys and have always asked for updates when we visit... that is huge for us! I also appreciate that they have a more natural approach to things that doesn't necessarily require prescriptions. I would strongly encourage anyone seeking a new pediatrician in the Madison area to consider Valley Internal Medicine.

resp.text: Thank you for your kind review!

name: Sherrel Nance
text: I’m giving one star solely on behalf of front desk. I called to reschedule my new patient appointment and a older lady answered and was very rude. I haven’t even actually been to this doctor but I’ve heard good things! As far as front staff goes, or whom ever answers the telephone was absolutely rude and that was a red flag for me. Just lost a future patient!

resp.text: Here at Valley Internal Medicine and Pediatrics we strive off providing kindness and compassion to our patients. We are sorry for the experience you have had with our staff. We will be sure to discuss with staff. Thank you for your review!

name: J F
text: If you want a responsible office staff, GO SOMEWHERE ELSE!! They NEVER answer their phones or return calls. I left a message to cancel an appt and they still charged me a no show fee of $80. It consistently takes numerous calls to get an appointment, sometimes weeks just to get an answer. Definitely going somewhere else.

resp.text: Good Morning, I believe  you have reviewed the wrong practice. We are Valley Internal Medicine and Pediatrics, Suite A. Thank you!

name: Romeo Rodriguez
text: Keith Watts is great but the practice is horrible. Dont care about their patients at all. All they care about is lining their pockets. I started seeing him for just a copay, then I was told I have to see an in house counselor ($100), gonna have to start having urine screens in house ($25) every month and then they dropped a bomb on me saying I owed the $350 for past urine screen I thought were being covered by my insurance. I was told a while back that counseling was necessary but I couldnt afford them and decided to do it at another location. Saw that guy for 6 months and then one day they said the cheap.option I found was out the  window. They weren't able to absorb the money and I would have to see their counselor in house. If counseling is a thing then why would it matter where I'm having it done at. I get it's a business but for years I just paid my copay and it was good. My monthly bill went from $50 to $200 in 2 months. We see these people hoping they want to help but they are our for themselves. Needless to say I will never return to Valley but again Keith Watts was great.

resp.text: Good Morning, I believe  you have reviewed the wrong practice. We do not have a Keith Watts with us. We are Valley Internal Medicine and Pediatrics, Suite A. Thank you!

name: Alexander Hartman
text: They've really been a good doctors office for everything except for the recent change of no longer being able to have the option of having your drug test billed through insurance which now cost me an extra $25/ month... But other than that great!

resp.text: Good Morning, I believe  you have reviewed the wrong practice. We are Valley Internal Medicine and Pediatrics, Suite A. Thank you!

name: Sean
text: I took a star because obviously (if you read other reviews) it can be hard to get someone on the phone some days.  However, that aside, the service is top notch and I highly recommend Dr. Al.  With a great, reliable doctor, I'm willing to deal with having to make multiple calls to the office some days.  Sometimes you get lucky and someone picks up on the first call; it's not always a problem.  More importantly to me, Dr. Al is solid and a pleasure to work with.

name: k swizzle
text: I scheduled an appointment only to find out whoever is at that front desk never scheduled it. Not only did I take off work for this, but I also don’t get to get the help I DESPERATELY need. This place SUCKS. Avoid at all costs.

resp.text: We are sorry you had this experience with our office! We will be sure to discuss this with our staff. Thank you for your review.

name: Bobby
text: Called me after my doctor sent them a referral. The admin rattled off a bunch of availability times with different doctors. I asked her to email the info. She hung up on me. Will ask to be referred somewhere else. With all of these negative reviews, how does this place stay in business?

resp.text: Good Morning, I believe  you have reviewed the wrong practice. We are Valley Internal Medicine and Pediatrics, Suite A. Also most these reviews are unfortunately for the wrong practice.Thank you!

name: Heather Freeman
text: Office staff are the worst I’ve ever experienced and they know it and don’t care.  If you have meds you need dependably don’t go here.

resp.text: Good Morning, I believe  you have reviewed the wrong practice. We are Valley Internal Medicine and Pediatrics, Suite A. Thank you!

name: Brien Devillo
text: Daniel Laeupple, M.D. is a fraud. 30 minute scheduled initial appoint. Took maybe 7 minutes with me, never finished new patient paperwork. Already had drug in mind before the first question was asked. The first 3 side effects of the drug he wanted to write were increased suicide, increased aggression, and insomnia. (All 3 things I was coming in for.) Also, when I went to voice my concerns the “doctor” Daniel Laeupple would not take a meeting. At $250 a pop, you people wonder why somebody would rather off themselves instead of the deal with you people. YOU are the stigma.

resp.text: Good Morning, I believe  you have reviewed the wrong practice. We do not have a Daniel Laeupple with us. We are Valley Internal Medicine and Pediatrics, Suite A. Thank you!

name: Michael
text: What an absolute joke. Office staff does not care at all. You will never get anyone on the phone unless they feel like picking up. Don't leave a voicemail because they will screw that up too. Went a week without medication because they ignored my voicemail. EVERY time I have been in there, the office staff is screwing around and talking while the phone is ringing. I will be finding a new doctor because it is so stressful every month to get my medicine and to make an appointment. TERRIBLE.

name: Laura Fincher
text: We have loved using Valley Med Peds. Dr. Lofty and her staff have been very encouraging and caring to our family. I recommend this pediatrician's office if you are looking for one!

resp.text: Thank you for your kind review!

name: Sarah J
text: Normally they do okay but the last time I went in June 26th the older lady that always works the front desk was rude. She didn’t greet my daughter and I when we walked in.. nor did the intern that was sitting next to her.. just handed me the clip board and I’m not sure why because I waited over 15 minutes before I actually went back up to her to ask for new patient paperwork that she should have given to me upon arrival.. then we waited another 15 minutes for her to come out and say aloud that we were suppose to be called back before everyone that was there after us were actually called back! Then after waiting another 15 minutes I finally decided that I wasn’t going to wait anymore because in 45 minutes we had gotten NO WHERE!!... so I go to the desk to reschedule and she was very unapologetic that I wasted my time there without my daughter being seen!... the only reason that I would continue to go there is because I do like the provider... if it wasn’t for Dr. Lofty I would choose a different pediatrician. In the future please be respectful of your patients time front desk.

resp.text: Good Morning, We are sorry you have had this experience with our staff and we will be sure to discuss this with our staff. Here at VIMP Kindness and compassion is very important to us. Thank you for your review!

name: David Tallent
text: Can't get an appointment, because they never answer phone.  When I did get through, they screwed up the appointment time then claimed it was my fault.  They used to call with reminds.  Never got one this time. Tried to get me to pay a $60 no show fee, after they screwed up the appointment. This is the second time they did this. I will never go back.

name: T E
text: Administrative staff is not friendly at all. I have been 3 times and every time I am taken late even when I am the first appointment. I usually wait at least 15-20 minutes for a 5 minute appointment. The staff does not answer the phone so good luck getting in touch with them.

name: Michael Tucker
text: I've seen both a counselor and a psychiatrist here. They were ok. Where they really mess up is literally everything else. I have not once in three months of weekly appointments been able to talk to someone on the phone. In fact, I've seen the woman at the window pick up a ringing phone and immediately set the handset back down hanging up on the caller. I've never had anyone pick up the phone, so that was an improvement! They have no voice message or website or social media to alert patients of closures. I've come twice this winter for my appointments only to find the office closed. It is exceedingly unprofessional and if you have any choice at all I urge to find psychiatric help elsewhere.

name: Craig
text: Here’s another one to add to the long list of comments about not answering the phone. So so stressful that you can NEVER get anyone to answer. For medication refills they want you to leave a voicemail and then show up at least 3 days later to get it. Cross your fingers they actually have your prescription since they refuse to call you back when it’s ready. Very unprofessional and to me it shows extreme lack of care. I’ve never been in a counseling session for longer than 5 minutes. It’s always, “How are ya?! Ok good here’s your scrips! NEXT!” Lastly, their appointment reminder system is a joke. It’s supposed to text, call and email you but I’ve never EVER received one. I’ve made sure they had my correct contact info about 6 times and they do... they just fail to remind me and then charge their $50-$60 no show fee to my account when they don’t. I’ve been there for 2 years now but I can’t take it anymore and I’ll be finding a new doc soon. Save yourself the stress and go somewhere else.

resp.text: Good Morning, I believe  you have reviewed the wrong practice. We are Valley Internal Medicine and Pediatrics, Suite A. Thank you!

name: I Queen
text: I once liked this office. The medical practitioners are good, but the staff & the process SUCKS! Every time you call, you are ALWAYS PLACED ON HOLD, AND THEN THE PHONE HANGS UP ON YOU ALMOST EVERYTIME!

name: Cheri Kamel
text: Great medical clinic. They have the friendliest medical staff who treat you as if you are family. Dr. Haggag is by far one of the best physicians I have been to. He is extremely caring and always makes sure your medical issues are dealt with.

name: Korey Moore
text: Staff is always friendly! I never have to wait more than 5 minutes. Dr. Alrefi is awesome, very attentive and professional. I would recommend anyone to go to this office (and do).

name: Bella Stevens
text: We’ve been patients of Dr lofty for 10 years

resp.text: Thank you for your kind review!

name: Breedwell Gal
text: I would NOT recommend this place to anyone that meds are narcotic.  I seen Brittany Kendrick and was automatically judged and discriminated. My Dr went out of practice and I’ve been off my meds since Nov 2018 and plainly told her what I’ve took over a long period of time with mental illness. She used horrible behavior and kept trying to talk over me and not listen to me, instead she wanted to tell me how she thought I felt!! I seen Keith Whatts there which was great and very attitive. However bc my Dr didn’t sends my records to Keith I couldn’t see him any longer, which I now know bc he was closing office.  Keith had me on a good safe regimen. Brittany however, I felt judge from the time the convo started. I had my mother in office with me and witness the whole situation. I’ve been unhealthy all my life and was hospitalized for anxiety starting at 5 years old.  Instead of this “ Nurse Practioner” listening to the severity of my symptoms and etc she wrote me for a med, said this is for anxiety and just as good as the Xanax.... IT WAS AN ANTIHISTAMINE!  Wow!!!! They treat patients as idiots!  Just bc people abuse drugs don’t give them the right to judge as they did me and highly discriminated me.  When try to talk to her all she done was smirked and showed no interest of the severity of my problem!!! That’s how people end up dead so to suicide a lot of times is bc no one cares, starting with healthcare! I begged her to please go speak with the Dr a quick sec for me bc for me, yes it was an emergency but no. U will have to schedule make another copay and so on. Mental health facilities are supposed to care but since drug addiction is bad in the WHOLE world, you will be judged. I hope they improve somehow bc I paid copay to be gave suedafed. Ridiculous!  If I didn’t have a chronic lifelong problem, I sure would not of went to a Psychiatrist!!! With over 9 years of records in hand proving all my facts she still didn’t care!! Thanks Kendrick for judging this woman and discrimination against me.  Good news travels but bad news travels faster.  As far as Keith, I have nothing bad to say about him.  He did understand not just medicate, he understood!!!

resp.text: Good Morning, I believe  you have reviewed the wrong practice. We do not have a Brittney Kendrick with us. We are Valley Internal Medicine and Pediatrics, Suite A. Thank you!

name: Marcie
text: I have habitually called to schedule a new patient appointment and can never get anybody to answer the phone. I've left numerous voicemails and never get a call back. If I can't even reach an actual person, why would I put my trust in their care? I definitely do not recommend this place.

name: Dinah B.
text: That whole place is a joke from the front desk to the back of the office they always putting you on hold and some how forgets your on the line Dr. Hagaag whole team needs to be fired his nurse practitioner needs to go back to medical school I had been going there a while always had the same insurance never change got to my doctors appt. And the girl at the front desk tells me my insurance is not active so she tried to make me pay $100 co pay, i refused i leave to go call my insurance provider low a behold it's still active so i had to do the doctors office job for them, another time they got my prescription wrong I had to make them call my pharmacy to verify my prescription turns out I was right, so no Thanks am taking my service else where when you try to give your care provider the benefit of the doubt and they act as tho your health doesn't matter to them.... but that's just my experience I wouldn't even refer my mother in law to them.

name: Alabama Girl
text: They are always kind there could be a wait but it's worth it to see a good doctor! The staff is excellent as well!

name: Hans Mader
text: They  N E V E R  answer the phone.  Aside from that, they're good.  Dr. Laeupple is a wonderful psychiatrist in my experience.

name: Shanna Springer
text: Good luck on getting someone from this office to answer the phone!  Love my doctor but come on, something has to give!

name: Anne A
text: The Nurses are amazing, along with the Nurse practitioners, and of course, the doctors. Dr.Haggag is the Adult Doctor who cares for my medical needs, and has since I was a child. And his wife Dr.Lotfie is the pediatrician who cares for my children and has there whole life. We follow him from Decatur to Madison because the medical care that is given here, is honestly just unbeatable. Yes, sometimes you'll have to wait a while if your in with Dr. Haggag, but it's because he gives his full care and attention to each person interested in his care. If you don't like waiting, you could always see the nurse practitioners, who are amazing! They work with him to make sure you get the care that you need and deserve. Trust me they will find out if something is wrong with you and they will not stop until they are sure you've been cared for and given the best medicine/ care possible. The nurses are all so fun and are just a hoot honey! If you've never been, i would highly recommend them to anyone seeking true medical and healt care. They are just the best hands down. To me, they are family. And that is something you might have a hard time finding anywhere else. Thanks again to all the staff and the amazing care you give to all of us day in and day out :)

name: skydivealdroid
text: My wife goes here, I called to setup a new appointment 3 times and had to leave a message, they never call back. My wife has stated the same this, she is sick of having to call them multiple times to finally get someone to talk to about appointments. I decided to go elsewhere because of this.

resp.text: We are sorry you had trouble getting an appointment with us. We are currently taking new patients and this should be a smooth process. We will be sure to discuss this with our staff! Thank you for your review.

name: Stephenie Becker
text: I was desperately searching for a pediatrician when my 3 year old was showing flu like symptoms. This place was the FIFTH place I called because no one else was taking new patients. They got me a next day appt. when I got there the front desk staff was pleasant. My appt was at one and I waited over 45 minutes to see the doctor! The nurse was cold and spent maybe a few minutes to get her symptoms. The doctor was nice enough but didn’t even take the extra precaution to do a quick flu test. The office rooms were not even decorated for a pediatricians office. It was not very welcoming or kid friendly. I gave them 3 stars for the fast appt and nice doctor but I think there had to be a better office that values your time and goes the extra mile to be more geared for children.

name: Porschalyn Nnadi
text: I like the helpfulness of the staff. I do wish the other Nurse Practitioner was still there though, but the new one is nice.

name: Austin Moore
text: Dr. Lauppelle is the best mental health doctor in the northern alabama vicinity in my own personal opinion.

name: Joshua Schaffer
text: Very very professional and will give you honesty

name: Marcel Girgis
text: Dr Ammar Alrefai did display antipathy towards legislation designed to protect the privacy of vulnerable patients and asked questions of the patient reflecting reliance on discredited, stereotypical assumptions relating to CBD oil. One session made me hate myself and directly impacted my scholastic performance. At least he was honest is saying that his practice would offer no services after taking my money. EDIT: I was able to contact Ammar via telephone several weeks after the consultation to have him write a refill of a common medication. I have modified my review to reflect this fact.

name: Rachel S
text: Michelle Pratt lacks empathy and emotion. Crystal at the front desk is one of the worst at this office. Everyone that works at this location are inconsistent and the doctor's are just trying to make a dollar. Never ever ever go here.

resp.text: Good Morning, I believe  you have reviewed the wrong practice. We do not have a Michelle Pratt with us. We are Valley Internal Medicine and Pediatrics Suite A. Thank you!

name: Camira Holtzclaw
text: My kids go here they are great

name: Hillary Shepherd
text: This place is horrible. I came for my sons appointment and we have been waiting for almost an hour and there is no one else waiting to be seen. They aren't helpful with questions either.

resp.text: Good Morning, We are sorry for this experience! Here at valley internal medicine we like to keep our wait times at a minimum. We will discuss this with our office staff. Thank you for your review.

name: S Welch
text: Wrong business..terribly sorry

resp.text: Good Morning, I believe  you have reviewed the wrong practice. We do not have a Brittney or Michelle in our clinic. We are Valley Internal Medicine and Pediatrics, Suite A. Thank you!

name: Sharita Bruce
text: Staff is very friendly and prompt. As long as I live here I will take my daughter there.

name: Dylan Macdonald
text: Keith watts is the best of the best

resp.text: Good Morning, I believe  you have reviewed the wrong practice. We do not have a Keith Watts with us. We are Valley Internal Medicine and Pediatrics, Suite A. Thank you!

name: Candi Storm
text: Best pediatrician ever!

name: Antana Martinez
text: The wait times are too long there.  My husband complains about it every time he goes in.

name: Brat
text: Don't even waste your time, you'll be better off diagnosing & treating yourself on google. The "Doctors" bedside manners are whack. They will fast talk you & run out without a real solution to your problem. I guess they haven't made it that far in class to really diagnose you. Just give them a cart & let them clean the restrooms!

name: Tammy Shirley
text: They do not return phone calls when you leave messages for a nurse to call you back. I have been waiting for 2 weeks for a nurse to call me back. Ive been a patient there for 6 years and it has been worse in the past year.

name: Martha Pittman
text: I came in to Stanton road clinic on Friday November 8th 2019. I was supposed to have all of my prescriptions called into my pharmacy at Walmart in Saraland by the physician and his nurse that I saw that day. I had told them I'd run out of all my prescriptions and needed them that day. I have heard nothing and here it is Tuesday the 12th of November and the medication needed is life-altering yet no one has called it in to my pharmacy or contacted me about it and I've called not once but twice about it. I have began getting sick Saturday because I didn't have my medication I am even sicker now and it's Tuesday and I'm pretty sure I'll be sicker by the time the week progresses.

name: firstnam lastnam
text: Training facility for USA  medical students. There is old doctor in the back (you don't get to see) , that runs a "class" with 4-8 "doctor students", they don't know what they doing and afraid to get a bad grade. Student doctors run messages between patient and real doctor (always gets misunderstood).  No serious medicine will be prescribed here. If you have a serious health issue they will send you somewhere else. Beware this is not a real doctor.

name: Tammy Peterson
text: This Clinic was a joke.  My mother was supposed to see a Dr. Ballard, I took her here and she saw an attending supposedly under a Dr. Leon. Who ever this is....Dr. Leon neglected my FMLA paperwork that was hand delivered to the clinic 7 business days in advance (9 if you include the weekend).  I know Dr's are busy but they still need to slow down and handle the other aspects of the business.  I called multiple times and left multiple messages for the nurse and the Dr with my callback info and due dates for my FMLA.  I never once recieved a call back to let me know everything was taken care of as promised. If you need to take FMLA to care for family, you absolutly cannot trust this clinic to get it done.  Who ever the REAL DR's are here, you need to step in and clean house, the service we've recieved is an embarrassment of your business skills.  Due to the incompetense here, my FMLA to care for my ill mother was denied and I now have an attendance issue that could get me fired.  I'm sure it's no sweat off your backs, your jobs are fine.  Mine is at risk now. Thank you for absolutly NOTHING!

name: Shawnee Waddell
text: I wish I could give -100 Sorriest healthcare

name: Sheena Rathel
text: They never do what they say they will. Iv been waiting for a reference to another dr for 10 months.they don't care,or the drs don't the ladies in the office r great.if I wasn't on Medacad I'd go to a REAL DR.

name: G. W.
text:
This place is a JOKE! Went there for an exam on my breast with a very notice able 2cm lump. First they say "Take advil for the swelling and come back when your 45". Im 23. They wont give me a mammogram til I'm 26, yet they have already billed me for two. The doctor ADAM HAUNG is a quack. Doesn't know any thing. Should be working as a janitor. I have been in and out with USA medical. Every time i go they screw me over and wont help. They wont even help with a runny nose. I paid my co-pay for a BS appointment. I could have gotten better treatment at a fast food place.

I can't pay what they are forcing me to pay when I have to find a REAL clinic to go to. Ive told them Im in pain from the lump. I told them to go ahead and biopsy it since they said radiology changed their 'terms'. Now if they find any mass during radiology tests they will biopsy it. Instead they sent me out the door, refuse to give me more info, refuse to give me treatment, refuse to help me any.

This is not my first problem. Went in when I was 14 for Endometriosis. They told me I had to be over 40 to get Endometriosis, then accused me of being sexually abused. WTF?? They sent me on my way then. Two months later I was 100% diagnosed with stage 3 Endometriosis.

I've spent countless hour trying to speak to some one to get this sorted. They refuse me to speak to me, they refuse to treat me, refuse to help me with payments on the bills.

They have hung up on me on the phone. They have even tried tacking on several other costs for tests they never even tried to do. They will make a less then $70 bill turn in to hundreds.

I am currently seeking an attorney. They way these people work, act, speak to people and so on is horrible. These people have no heart in what they do.

GO SOMEWHERE ELSE!

name: Betty Friday
text: I am gracefully that I had a doctor's appointment at Stanton Rd   on September of o8, I had a heart attack ,wail I was getting ready to go to my appointment .I had a very lite heart attack , I didn't realize that I had one .my left hand and arm left.as  like it was not there .no feels in it the doctors at Stanton Rd ,sent me to the USA .I stayed there for 4days .

name: Darlene Hughes
text: Ok

name: Melissa Rhoades
text: I have to give a shout out to Dentists 4 Children.  My grandson was very nervous when told he had an abscessed baby tooth that needed to be removed before it damaged his permanent tooth.  Not sure where to go, we contacted Dentists 4 Children.  The office staff was very helpful in the appointment process, getting him in quickly.  Even though my grandson was terrified of the unknown , the staff eased his fear of having a tooth removed, reassuring him he was going to be fine.  My grandson came out smiling, and stated it didn't even hurt.  They also found some other dental issues that needed to be address.  He had such a great experience that it was no hassle getting him back for his next visit.  If you are looking for a professional dentist office for kids, I encourage you to give Dentist 4 Children a try.  Dr. Thornton and her staff is amazing!  I just had to brag and say "Thank you" for making my grandson's experience a good one to remember:)!!

name: •kara•
text: Our visit with 4kids dentistry was great. Dr. Thornton and the staff was excellent. They diagnosed and treated my grandson’s dental problem within two days. He was not upset at all before nor after his treatment. Thanks for a job well done. Mrs. Venable

name: ramona blocton
text: One of if not the best dentist for children in Montgomery. I appreciate her patience and and quickness. And she has a wonderful staff that are very caring and welcoming.

name: Shelby Figurin
text: I had a dental emergency and Dr Thornton was able to fit me in that day and fix my teeth. She and her staff were incredibly professional and were exceptionally kind to me as I was very anxious during this visit. They even had an iPad with movies on it that helped to distract me during my visit. I would definitely recommend this office to anyone looking for exceptional pediatric dental care.

name: Brittney Adams
text: Such a great environment! I was nervous but the staff made me feel so comfortable. My appointment was quick and easy. Highly recommend them to anyone.

name: SaRhonda Cheatham
text: Professional, friendly, and compassionate staff! My 3 year old loved the entire staff. As we were leaving, she said, “Thank you, Mr. Dentist!” to all the women that were working. Lol! Great experience for my toddler!

name: Berna Adams
text: Very professional and covid compliant office. The dentist and office staff were very attentive to my children's dental needs. The office has a cheerful inviting atmosphere.

name: Karen Ziglar
text: My granddaughters love Dr Thornton and staff! They take time with their patients and strive to help each patient develop a healthy attitude toward life long dental health!

name: Amanda Cobb
text:
They are great with all three of my kids!  We've been going here for over 4 years now and will continue to.
Very friendly staff! Our youngest son can be uncooperative at times and Miss Jeanie is super sweet with him so he does better with her, but all the ladies are great!

name: FUSHION MEI
text: Will not allow a parent to accompany their child on the appointment and try to home behind "Covid" as the reason. Neither the hospital (where Covid patients are actually treated) nor the pediatrician require a guardian to sit outside and wait until the appointment is over. So what are YOU doing back there??

name: Coco Diorre’
text: A M A Z I N G we love them, they’re  so professional

name: rhonda mincey
text: My son loves this office!!

name: brittany wiilliams
text: visited here this pass Monday with my child really didn't like the fact that no parent is allowed in the back with your small child although,in a previous visit i was allowed but for some reason now its no longer allowed. Front desk check in woman seems to me to be a bit racist or didn't want to be bothered with a black parent at the moment cause when i watched her interact with the other parent behind me she seemed to not have the same manner with her . Will be taking my daughter to a dentist with a better atmosphere.

name: A Newell
text: Dr. Thornton is truly gifted in dentistry! I have taken my children here now for 5 years and wish I had started there to begin with. I originally went to another pediatric dentist, and we ended up having troubles with the quality of work. Dr. Thornton however is a life saver. She is amazing with kids and her staff are also. I actually  have kids that like the      dentist now!!!! Truly!!!! My  kids have had to have teeth pulled for braces, exposures for braces, and all their regular cleanings. Not one tear !!!!!! Both my kids say they never felt any shots because of the numbing jelly and and I think this office is awesome!! When kids walk out with bloody gauze and smiles, you know it's good. I can't recommend them enough, honest. What a relief to know my kids are not going to be fearful of a dentist all their life. If your kids have teeth and you want the best for them, this is the place and Dr.Thornton is the dentist

name: Lisa Davis
text: My daughter absolutely loves Dr. Heather and the staff.  She's been a patient of theirs since she was 3 years old.  She's never had a bad experience and so she actually loves going to the dentist.  She's even had a filling and that was such a great experience that it didn't dampen her love of being there.  The office staff is super friendly and have always been helpful and have accommodated our needs to the best of their ability. I would highly recommend this dental practice!

name: Allison Hollis
text: My children have been going to this office for several years and I couldn't be more pleased!  We have never had anything but the best care from the Dentist, and the ladies up front are so nice and helpful.  The Assistants and Hygienist are amazing, making sure to always put my children at ease and explain everything that will be happening that day.  If you want great dental care and a great family atmosphere I'd highly recommend them!

name: Breanna Warren
text: I would not have even given them one star. We had an unexpected death in our family and my son had a dental appointment he missed because of this. Clearly our mind was not on the dental appointment. Friday when I realized he had missed it I tried to call but they were closed, I called back Monday to explain what happened and they refused to see him even after explaining the circumstance. Disrespectful!

name: J McCormick
text: Truly a loving and caring practice. They put the well being of the child above everything else. They are honest about the things that have to be done and need to be done. Dr. Thornton is the only dentist for my kids. Have had other dentist with bad experiences so much that they did not want to go to a dentist when they were small, but Dr. Thornton and her staff eradicated those fears. We have been going there for almost 11 years now. Only have one problem. They only handle pediatric patients. My oldest is 17 and will soon have to find a 'grown up" dentist and I don't know how well that is going to work out for her! They adore "Dr. Heather" and its going to be a hard sell for someone else to fill that place.

name: Carolyn Wilson
text: My son has always had good, even enjoyable, experiences going to the dentist thanks to the Dentists 4 Children staff.  Dr. Thornton is very thorough and attentive and fun!  And they recommended us to a great orthodontist group too.  Our son's mouth was overcrowded.  Dr. Thornton fully prepared him ahead of time for braces.  I truly believe her careful pre-planning in this area highly contributed to our son only needing to wear braces for the minimally required time.  He got them off this year and has a beautiful smile!

name: mankus777
text: I took my one year old for his first check and everyone was so nice! The ladies in the back all talked to him and made us feel welcome. Dr. Thornton was so sweet and thorough in her check and made me feel better about our teeth care at home. Dr. Vann saw us once for an emergency and took great care to inform us and make us feel at ease. Can't wait to take my little one back!

name: Leigh Ann Parsons
text: i highly recommend Dr. Heather Thornton and her staff.  Their office is friendly, warm and very professional.  My daughters ages 12 and 15 have been patients of Dr. Thornton since their very first teeth cleaning at age 2.   They have always enjoyed their dental appointments and cleanings.  We love Dentists 4 Children.

name: Brad Cole
text: Our experience here over the last 8 years has always been great. All of the doctors and Dr. Thornton in particular have gone out of their way to make us and our children feel at ease. We wouldn't consider using any other dental practice

name: Robin Darby
text: My son enjoys going to get his teeth cleaned at Dentists 4 Children.  Professional staff, exceptional service, clean and child-friendly environment. The hygienists and doctors have all been very patient and loving to our family.

name: Dodey Roughton
text: We absolutely love Dr. Thornton and the entire office staff!  Everyone from the reception area to the hygienist to the billing/check out area is so friendly.  I trust Dr. T to the utmost as she has always treated my children as she would her own!  I'm a Type A/OCD  mom and Dr. Thornton has never made me feel crazy :)  It definitely feels like family and my girls love it too!!

name: Stephanie Johnson
text: Wonderful dentist office and staff.  My youngest son chipped a front tooth a couple of years ago.  Dr. Thornton has always been concerned with the amount of anguish he is experiencing as we try and file the bonding to make them even.  She really cares about her patients!!  She's done a wonderful job in doing what he can tolerate and it looks great.  She always takes the time to answer mine and his questions.

name: Lindsay Lyons
text: Doctors and staff here are wonderful! They understand that a trip to the dentist can be a stress time for your little ones and they go out of their way to be sure that it goes as smoothly as possible for everyone. I would highly recommend this office to anyone looking for quality, friendly dental care.

name: Catherine Watts
text: We couldn’t be more pleased with our experiences at Dentists 4 Children. Dr. Thornton has gone above and beyond to ensure our children receive the best care in a compassionate atmosphere. She even coordinates care with our orthodontist and oral surgeons to ensure all our children’s dental needs are met.

name: Micaela Morbidelli
text: Have always gone here and always have had a great experience.  Office staff as well as dental staff have always been courteous and professional. The waiting room is always clean.  We love Dr. Thornton!

name: Donna Grier
text: My kids have been going to Dr. Thornton for years now. After a bad experience from another dentist office, we made the switch to Dentists 4 Children.  I'm so glad we made the decision to switch. My kids no longer dread going. In fact, my daughter asked me just this morning if it was time to have her teeth cleaned.  We love Dentists 4 Children!

name: Rachel Barley
text: I have always had a great experience taking my children to Dentist 4 Children. The staff is always friendly, and they do a thorough job. Our appointments are on time, with minimal wait.

name: Julia Rigsby
text: We love Dr. Thornton! All the staff are great with children, the office is very kid friendly, and Dr. Thornton is great at what she does! I highly recommend for children of all ages.

name: Cindy Rigsby
text: As a long time patient, we have always had a great experience at Dentist 4 Children. The staff is very caring, and Dr. Thornton is the best at making your child at ease when it comes to checkups.

name: Cheryl Smith
text: Dr. Thornton and her staff do a great job. So glad we found her dental practice. I highly recommend this office if your child needs dental care.

name: Elizabeth
text: Dr. Thornton has excellent bedside manner skills! The staff here is excellent!

name: Tracy Kicker
text: My child loved going to the dentist, and that is not something as a parent you take lightly. Dental visits are something that if are not positive and enjoyable as a child , you will not go as an adult. I highly recommend Drs. Vann & Thornton and their wonderful staff to all my family and friends with children.

name: Jacob Mincey
text: I ♥️ my dentist!

name: Jamie Taylor
text: Love Dr. Thornton and Dentists 4 Children. I have six children and although going to the dentist can be unnerving for some kids, none of mine have ever had an issue with going to the dentist, thanks to the great Doctors and staff at Dentists 4 Children!

name: Robin Swicord
text: My children have always had a pleasent experience and the staff has always been helpful. We love Dr. Thornton and the rest of the staff.

name: Danine Bruner
text: My twins are about to be 12 and they have come here since they were 3. We have always had to have morning appts because my son has special needs. As a special education teacher of preK children, I understand the need for earlier appts for younger children and those with special needs....they are more tired in the afternoon and not as calm. I also understand the reason parents are not allowed back in the treatment area. Many times in the morning, the children will cry for their parents to stay when dropped off at school. The longer the parent stays, the more they cry. Within a few minutes after parents leave, they have stopped crying. I feel the best thing a parent can do is to prepare their child for a new experience by telling them something like "I love you and want you and your teeth to be healthy. I am taking you to the dentist so your teeth can be healthy. I will not be able to go back there with you, but I would never take you to someone who would hurt you. When you go back remember that they are there to keep you healthy. I will be right there to get you when you are finished."

name: Camillia Petty
text: They keep parents very informed about children's dental health.

name: Michelle Kelley
text: Dr. Heather and the entire staff are wonderful!!!  My children love going to the dentist!

name: Shelly Nickles
text: My kids love going here, they make it a great experience.

name: Stacy Glass
text: We love Dr. Thornton! My kids look forward to their cleanings!

name: Donna Stalnaker
text: Love Dentists 4 Children! Great, friendly staff, wonderful with children

name: Hope T
text: Great pediatric dentist group! Very friendly, caring, and professional!

name: Jolene Woodall
text: Awesome staff and great dental care by all!

name: Tammy Bramlett
text: Answers calls but hangs up immedinatly.

name: Emily Serna
text: They are great with the children

name: Tammy Bramlett
text: Answers calls but hangs up immedinatly.

name: Emily Miles
