name: Beth Haynes
text: Popped in to get a flu vaccine.  As usually the staff was friendly and we were in and out in not time at all. We love ESCC.

name: ABEI CAPITAL PARTNERS
text:
Poor scheduling communication. Staff does not warn you that their phones for two separate locations rings to only the fairhope location. They express no regard for your time that your taking off from work when they send you to their other location. Has been an ongoing issue for several years but yet they have taken no measure to change or update their scheduling procedures. So many options to prevent miscommunication and yet they take none of these options.
If they cannot schedule with proper communication what communication errors transpire when caring for these children?

name: Dwanda Schwarz
text:
***UPDATED,, instead of issuing an apology for THEIR ERROR in appointment scheduling communication they issued me a letter they were ending service instead of apologizing or agreeing to train staff appropriately to prevent this below incident from happening again*** I have gone to this clinic for over a year now. (Eastern Shore). I love the dr's and the staff. My biggest issue is the disorganization and lack of training to staff who sets appointments. I used to go to the Fairhope location about 35 minute drive from my house because I was new to the area and was unaware of their Spanish Fort location. Over a year ago I had shown up to the Fairhope location like so many times before and they said they accidentally set my appointment up at the spanish fort location. I was one frustrated because I had not taken enough time off work to drive in circles nor could I miss the appointment. But I was happy to know there was one only 5 miles from my house! So I started going to that location for the remainder of the year. I thought I had made the error and called the wrong location and didnt think anything of it until yesterday I called at 8am when they opened and needed to make a same day appointment for my daughter who fell very ill. I googled the clinic and called the Spanish Fort office by the phone number listed to the location I wanted to set my appt with. (little did I know they do not have separate phone lines!!! so please PLLLLEASE PLEASE beware when your setting your appt!!!) . She told me she could get me in at 210 and I happily accepted the appointment.
SHE NEVERRRRR mentioned this was an appointment for Fairhope, nor did she say "which location would you like to set your appointment for". I think if they are going to have 1 receptionist for both locations this is soooo CRUCIAL!!! It is a huge disrespect for peoples times! I thought I was only taking 1 hour off work to run my daughter 5 miles from my house, but it ended up being a 3 hour venture!
I was scheduled to get my windshield wipers fixed after the drs appointment right by their clinic and was not prepared to drive very far. (and I ended up missing my car repair appointment!) My windshield wipers had broke. So I had to drive 40 minutes in a huge down pour shaking and crying because I was so scared and unprepared to drive in a heavy down pour, but it was also crucial my daughter was seen and didnt miss her appointment. Had the receptionist been trained to advise ALL CALLERS that they have 2 locations I would have set my appointment up for my windshield wiper repair before the drs appointment so my daughter and I could safely travel to our destination. So since the receptionist is not trained to advise callers that she sets appointments up for both locations and needs to confirm which location your setting your appointment for then please please please do her job for her and ask her where is she setting your appointment up for. Though I did tell her I love her Spanish Fort location and she disregarded that, I feel it maybe crucial to make sure you have her repeat the appointment location more then once to be on the safe side and to save you over an hour driving back and forth to the two seperate locations.

name: Patrick Johns
text: Urgent care for children what a joke I have a six week old daughter that I was told by the pediatrician to take care set up an appointment was scheduled for 8:00 a.m. next morning I was asking confirm my appointment after confirming my appointment I was told that they don't see children under 3 months old what the hell does that mean either you're a child care specialist or you're not I wouldn't take my child here if I was you just to waste of time people are very rude and it's all in what they want to do I suggest you just take your child to the emergency room as I was told to do

resp.text:
Patrick,

Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us. For some chief complaints, like a fever in a 6 week old, there is a high possibility that your child will need ER evaluation due to the need for certain tests that can only be done there. Hence, we have to comply with some basic triage of patients depending on their age and reason for the visit. This is in the best interest of the patient and the family. We are happy to have a team member reach out to explain further over a phone call with you if needed. We hope your daughter is feeling much better!

name: Joy Stevons
text: the staff was wonderful at interacting with my 3 year old. and super friendly to us.

resp.text: It's truly an honor to serve kiddos and families like yours in the after-hours all 365 days of the year, Joy! Thank you for choosing Urgent Care for Children. We hope your child feels better soon.

name: Shea Bailey
text: Had a great experience here. Staff was prompt and friendly and we were in and out. I love that you can make an appointment and aren’t sitting there for hours waiting. Will definitely be coming here again!

resp.text: Quality care with less waiting isn't just our motto, it's what we strive for every day at all UC4C locations. We want to thank you for trusting Urgent Care for Children with the care of your kiddo, SBailey318!

name: Matthew Renfrow
text: Very disappointed with the attitude of the staff. When we questioned a procedure, we were told the conversation was over. Kathy has poor customer service and very little empathy. We will not return or recommend.

resp.text:
Matthew,

First and foremost, we want to deeply apologize for your recent experience at our Highway 280 location. At Urgent Care for Children, we deeply value customer service and believe that all families who visit us should walk away with a great understanding of the care their child received. We clearly missed that mark in your case and we are sorry. A member of our team will be reaching out to you in the coming days to speak further about your experience. Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us.

name: Julie Schultz
text: The lady at the front desk was so sweet and helpful! We were in and out very quickly!  The doctor was thorough and personable!

resp.text: Quality care with less waiting is what we strive for all 365 days of the year. Thank you for choosing and trusting Urgent Care for Children, Julie!

name: Katie Clark
text: Overall good experience, saw us within an hour and were very professional

resp.text: Thank you so much for sharing your feedback with us, Katie! We hope your kiddo is feeling much better.

name: Lynne Burgin
text: This is the BEST care you will get!! They are nice, kind, gentle and very understanding. Thank you for everything. They have helped me many time! I am so thank for them!

resp.text: Providing families like yours with quality care and less waiting is our top priority. We are so happy to hear you had a great visit to our Highway 280 location. Thank you for choosing and trusting Urgent Care for Children, Lynne!

name: Jay Jones
text: The staff were really quick, friendly and helpful during the process of getting my covid rapid test.  Highly recommended!

resp.text: Thank you for trusting our Highway 280 Team with your COVID-19 test, Jay!

name: Jennifer Williams
text: We waited 45 minutes past our appointment time in the waiting room with several other sick children. Then, we were finally taken back to a room where we waited another hour to actually see a doctor. I will never be back. The rooms were falling apart and gross. Terribly slow!

resp.text:
Jennifer,

On behalf of everyone at Urgent Care for Children, I would like to sincerely apologize for your recent experience at our Highway 280 location. We strive to provide quality care with less waiting all 365 days of the year, and when we miss that mark, we work diligently to identify what went wrong. We have already begun this process in your case and want to thank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us.  Once again, we are truly sorry.

name: Meagan Findlay
text: The Doctor was great and spend time with us. I didn't feel rushed.

resp.text: Thank you for choosing and trusting Urgent Care for Children, Meagan!

name: pedro martinez
text:
Very thankful for them. Only complaint was this last time, they were slow, not because they were packed, we were the only ones in the waiting room. The office manager lady became cognizant of the situation, went back there and got them moving. She had loving words that comforted my boy. Yes, the little things matter.
Gave us a follow up call to check on him and informed us they refunded our copay! (Because of the circumstances/situation). Top notch move and loyalty earned. Customer service might not be dead yet. Someone besides Chick fil a still believes in it.

resp.text:
Pedro,

We are grateful to serve families like yours all 365 days of the year. We want to apologize for your wait and sincerely thank you for your patience and understanding. Our team is committed to ensuring a positive patient experience for all. Earning your loyalty means a lot to us! Thank you for choosing Urgent Care for Children.

name: Karen McDonald
text: Last minute appointment at the end of their day but they were still so nice and accommodating to give this mom peace of mind!! I appreciated them not making me feel bad for scheduling at the end of their day!!

resp.text: At Urgent Care for Children, we know that no price tag can be put on a parent's peace of mind. That's why we are happy to serve families like yours all 365 days of the year. Thank you for choosing and trusting UC4C, Karen!

name: Karen McDonald
text: Last minute appointment at the end of their day but they were still so nice and accommodating to give this mom peace of mind!! I appreciated them not making me feel bad for scheduling at the end of their day!!

resp.text: At Urgent Care for Children, we know that no price tag can be put on a parent's peace of mind. That's why we are happy to serve families like yours all 365 days of the year. Thank you for choosing and trusting UC4C, Karen!

Very thankful for them. Only complaint was this last time, they were slow, not because they were packed, we were the only ones in the waiting room. name: Jessie Dunnaway
text: The nurses I dealt with were very kind, cordial, patient. They were caring and professional at the same time. I felt completely at ease and was sure I was being cared for properly. I appreciate all these front line workers are doing for us.

resp.text: We are so grateful for your appreciation, Jessie. We will be sure to share your kind words with our staff. Thank you for choosing and trusting Urgent Care for Children.

name: Kathy McMurtry
text:
We were headed to Florida, for fall break, when We noticed our daughter leg looked like it had a spider bite.
We made an apt here, as we were passing though. They were friendly, quick and the MD was very knowledgeable. They even had the meds, we needed on site.
We were done and back on the road, in no time.  Thank you!

resp.text: Bug bites are never any fun, especially when you're headed on vacation! We are happy to hear that we were able to provide your daughter with quality and convenient care so that you could get back on the road quickly. Thank you for trusting us with the care of your kiddo, Kathy!

name: Ashley Ruffin
text: They were fast and friendly. My children were afraid of the COVID test and the staff did a great job at comforting my children.

resp.text: Our team of pediatric professionals aim to create a comfortable environment for all of our patients, especially in times like these. Thank for your feedback and for choosing Urgent Care for Children, Ashley!

name: Mary Melcher
text: Quick and easy covid testing! The nurse that administered my test was so friendly and efficient!!

resp.text: Quality care with less waiting is what we strive for all 365 days of the year! Thank you for choosing and trusting Urgent Care for Children, Mary.

name: Leslie Grace Schmidt
text: We had a great experience! Very fast to get in after opening. Very caring staff too.

resp.text: Thank you for choosing and trusting Urgent Care for Children, Leslie!

name: Shane Herring
text: Extremely professional, efficient, empathetic and incredibly sweet with my little boy. Very pleased with our experience.

name: Lisa Miller
text: Always professional, care is done timely and thoroughly.  The staff is extremely nice and caring.

resp.text: Thank you for sharing your feedback with us, Lisa! We are honored by your kind words and will share them with our Highway 280 Team.

name: Gloria Aitken
text: My family was Covid tested here. Testing was quick, easy, and they were great with my kids.

resp.text: It's an honor to serve families like yours during the COVID-19 pandemic and all 365 days of the year, Gloria. Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us!

name: Brooke Hughes
text: Our wait was quick and we did not have to wait forever for my daughter to be seen! I would highly recommend.

resp.text: Quality care with less waiting is what we strive for all 365 days of the year. Thank you so much for choosing UC4C and giving us your seal of approval, Brooke!

name: Sheila Magnusson
text: Very quick service, friendly staff, clean. Glad they are here!

resp.text: Thank you for choosing and trusting Urgent Care for Children, Sheila!

name: LoveLi LoveLi
text: The doctor and nurse were amazing! Really sweet and knowledgeable. I would definitely recommend!

resp.text: Thank you so much for sharing your feedback with us and for choosing Urgent Care for Children, LoveLi!

name: Akashya Smith
text: Everyone was so nice & helpful. My 2 year old is usually terrified of nurses or doctors. Even with all the PPE on she was laughing with them & jabbering. Of course when the swab came out she lost it, but for only a few seconds. If it wasn’t an hour drive we would continue to use them. Thank y’all for making the process easy from the beginning booking online, all the text updates, notification & even submitting the paper work online. AAA+

resp.text:
Akashya,

We are so happy to hear that despite the swab, you child felt at home with our team during your visit to Urgent Care for Children. Thank you for choosing Urgent Care for Children and for sharing your experience with us! We will be sure to pass your kind words along to our Team.

name: justiceplaz yt
text: The staff and care providers were super friendly and thorough. I will definitely recommend them to friends and family.

resp.text: Thank you for sharing your feedback and trusting our team to provide care to your family!

name: Gabriela Sisco
text: Super recommended. I like the hours and services they provide!

resp.text: We are honored to have your recommendation, Gabriela! Thank you for choosing Urgent Care for Children.

name: Angela Meetze
text: It was a very easy in and out.  Very clean!

resp.text: Thank you for choosing and trusting Urgent Care for Children, Angela!

name: Dana Duell
text: My daughter was sick and running a fever.  I tried our primary care provider first who didn’t have any openings that afternoon and upon their referral I called Urgent Care for Children on 280.  I was informed I could be a walk in our schedule an appointment time online so I opted to schedule a time because general that means you don’t have to wait as long.  I arrived for my daughter’s appointment early to complete any necessary paperwork since we’d not been there before.  I signed in told reception we had an appointment he looked and confirmed but then said this: “I know you have an appointment but....”. Wait what?  Why would you say that to a mom, who took the time to fill the forms in online and make an appointment?  “I know you have an appointment but” there is a walk in, 🤔 yes there is but I made an appointment for which I showed up on time.  So NO, it is not acceptable to say this to a mom and who has a kid with fever in your waiting room with who know what the others in the waiting room have.  We are in the middle of flu season and multiple other viruses and I made an appointment and those with an appointment come first especially when I walked in at the same time as said “walk-ins”.  Needless to say he was not apologetic for dismissing the fact I called ahead and made an appointment and came at that time.  And for that I would give 1 ⭐️, the nurse and Nurse practitioner were what drove the rating up.  They were pleasant and helpful, my daughter thankfully only had a virus so we didn’t end up with meds and thankfully nothing else she may have been exposed to by not being taken back when she should have been.  But that’s my rating for all it’s worth.  I really don’t like to give bad ones, but bottom line we won’t go back.

resp.text:
Dana,

Thank you for taking the time to share this feedback with us. On behalf of everyone at Urgent Care for Children, I want to sincerely apologize for your experience. We are taking all corrective measures to ensure that this does not happen again. A member of our team will be reaching out to you in the coming days to further discuss your experience. Once again, thank you for your time.

name: Fatima Castillo
text: Staff is very friendly, they made me feel at ease.

resp.text: Thank you for choosing and trusting Urgent Care for Children, Fatima!

name: MaKeUp JuNkIe
text: Awesome staff and awesome experience!

resp.text: Thank you for choosing Urgent Care for Children, Makeup Junkie!

name: Corrie Spigner
text: I dreaded going but the experience wasn’t as bad as I thought it would be! The young lady who tested me was nice & didn’t make me feel she was disgusted! Overall nice & quick visit!!!

resp.text: Our goal is to always make you feel comfortable and at home during your visit with us. Thank you for trusting Urgent Care for Children, Corrie!

name: Nunyo Biznass
text: Fast covid testing service. Real kind folks.

resp.text: Thank you for choosing and trusting Urgent Care for Children, Nunyo!

name: Kristi Rudd
text: No problem making appointment online that morning. Clean waiting room and exam rooms. Waited only 5 minutes before we were brought into exam room. MUCH better than sitting for 2 to 3 hours in an urgent care. Doctor was knowledgeable and staff were all pleasant. Will definitely use again if need arises.

resp.text:
Kristi,

We are glad to hear that you experienced both less waiting and quality care during your recent visit with us. While we hope that your child doesn't fall ill anytime soon, we are always here in case you need us. Our doors are open 365 days a year, including weekends and holidays. Thank you for taking the time to leave us a review!

name: Jennifer Holloman
text: Our baby was having an allergic reaction. We fluctuated between going to Children’s Hospital and going here. We decided to go here because he wasn’t having any trouble breathing. But we were really scared and nervous. The only reason I didn’t give five stars was because when I initially came in the receptionist was on the phone and didn’t acknowledge me. I waited several minutes before I finally interrupted her and asked if they could help us.  She was perfectly nice and eventually helpful,  but I was already anxious and that didn’t help. After that though, everything was great. We were in and out in less than an hour. The doctor was super knowledgeable and attentive. I feel like he was very thorough. He had a good bedside manner. I have no complaints about the doctor.  The place seemed pretty clean. We left very pleased with our experience. We would go back if we needed to.

resp.text:
Hi Jennifer,

Your feedback is invaluable to us here at Urgent Care for Children. It is always great to hear that families were satisfied with their visit with our pediatricians. I do apologize for your initial encounter with our front desk staff. We are taking immediate steps to address this and ensure that all families are properly greeted once stepping foot in our doors. Thank you for choosing UC4C!

name: Katie Gomez
text: Great staff, very caring nurses take time with you and your child. The doctor was very nice and very thorough when checking my child out!! We were in and out so quick, remember you can reserve your spot online!! Great experience

resp.text:
Katie,

Our team is dedicated to providing quality care with less waiting to families like yours in the after-hours and weekends. And we are always happy to hear when others take advantage of our "Save Your Spot Online" feature. We will be sure to share your kind words with our team. Thank you for trusting Urgent Care for Children!

name: Monica McShan
text: The visit was quick and efficient. I highly recommend.

resp.text: That's great news! Thank you for choosing and trusting Urgent Care for Children, Monica.

name: Dena Yearwood
text: We are very happy to have access to the Urgent Care for Children clinics for weekend and after clinic hours care.  We have been pleased with the visits that we have experienced since their initial opening.  From the time of scheduling an appointment to check out,  thoroughness and efficiency are maintained and appreciated, especially with young children that are not feeling well.  Thank you for the great care!

resp.text:
Dena,

At Urgent Care for Children, we consider it our honor to provide care to kiddos 365 days a year, including the after-hours, holidays, and weekends. We are grateful for families like yours who trust our pediatricians to provide quality, convenient, and continuity of care to their little ones. Thank you for sharing your feedback and for trusting Urgent Care for Children!

name: Vincent Tortorici
text: That went great and was very efficient only gave 4 stars waiting to see how quick I get results.

resp.text: Thanks for choosing Urgent Care for Children, Vincent.

name: Lucy Seagle
text: Nice clean facility. All of the staff was friendly, courteous, and caring. The doctor and nurse practitioner did a great job of listening to me and my concerns and explaining things to me. Would recommend this place for sure

resp.text:
Lucy,

Earning two thumbs up from parents like you is the greatest award in our book! We are so happy to hear that you had a great visit to our 280 location. Thank you for trusting Urgent Care for Children.

name: Deanne Guthrie
text: Great experience.  Very caring professionals.

resp.text: Thank you for trusting our team to provide your family with care in the after-hours, Deanne!

name: Jephrey Collins
text: Didn’t take very long once I got there. It was pretty quick and easy testing

resp.text: Thank you for choosing Urgent Care for Children, Jephrey!

name: Laura whisenhunt
text: Was there for covid testing , staff was very courteous and I felt safe, they took every precaution and followed protocol perfectly.

resp.text: The safety of you and your family is our top priority, Laura. Thank you for sharing your experience with us and for choosing Urgent Care for Children!

name: Arnar Thors
text: First time and last. The Dr put three staples in my 6 year old sons head wound without numbing or discussing with my wife prior to do it. The staples are poorly placed probably due to my son moving from the pain.  Can not recommend.

resp.text:
Hi Arnar,
We are sorry to hear about your experience at our Birminghamclinic. Our team strives to provide quality care for each and every patient, and we take this feedback seriously. A member of our team will be reaching out to you shortly to discuss your experience. Thank you for choosing Urgent Care for Children and we hope you will consider us for all your future urgent pediatric care needs.

name: lashundra hunt
text: This facility is amazing! They showed care and compassion for my children.  The wait time is Phenomenal.  The facility is clean and the staff is very professional.  The snacks provided made for a peaceful visit and welcomed distraction! Thank God they were open even on Fourth of July !

resp.text:
Hi Lashundra,

We are so glad to hear that you had a wonderful experience with us and that our snacks helped make your visit a bit smoother. You can find us here 365 days a year! Thank you for choosing Urgent Care for Children.

name: Christi Mathers
text: Super quick and easy visit. If i ever need an after hours doctor for my 19 month old again, this is where I am going!

resp.text: We are honored to have your stamp of approval, Christi! Thank you for choosing UC4C and trusting our team with the care of your little one.

name: Jennifer Wilkes
text: This place is amazing!! I would highly recommend!! It’s very clean, Sweet staff, convenient, fast, SUPER kid friendly with Disney on, snacks for kids, coloring activity! I can’t say enough about how great this place is!! So thankful we have this certain urgent care so close to us.

resp.text:
Jennifer,

At Urgent Care for Children, we know that when your kiddo doesn't feel well one of the last things they want to do is sit in a doctor's office. That's why you will find coloring pages, juice boxes, snacks, and cartoons in our lobby every time. We are grateful to serve families like yours 365 days of the year! Thank you for your kind words and for choosing Urgent Care for Children.

name: Zee Brooks
text: Very friendly staff (: I would definitely go there again!

resp.text: Our staff is grateful to serve families like yours all year long, Zee. Thanks for choosing Urgent Care for Children!

name: brian martin
text: Wait was a little long but the nurses were very kind. Definitely would go back.

resp.text:
Brian,

We want to apologize for your wait and thank you for your patience and for choosing Urgent Care for Children!

name: Monica Riggins
text: Easy online registration and quick visit for flu vaccines.

resp.text: We are grateful to serve families like yours, Monica. Thank you for choosing and trusting Urgent Care for Children!

name: Aaron Tidwell
text: Very good fast friendly service ! And it’s so close, so very convenient

name: Abi Jacobs
text: We went on a Sunday and the waiting room was packed. The wait was a little long but that’s understandable with so many sick babies. Doctor Anderson was fantastic with our son and let him get used to her without making it feel like she was in a big hurry. Overall our experience was wonderful and if we ever need an after hours clinic we will definitely go back!

resp.text: That's great news that you had a wonderful experience with us, Abi! We are very excited to have Dr. Anderson on our team as she is very talented. Thank you for your insightful feedback!

name: Terry Mills
text: Our 14 month old granddaughter became sick while we were keeping her for the weekend.  We were able to see the doctor very quickly and she diagnosed the problem for us.  The entire staff from the reception desk to the nurses were both helpful and professional.  We will certainly use this Urgent Care facility again if the need arises.

resp.text: This is wonderful news, Terry! We are honored to serve patients like your granddaughter. We are committed to providing quality care for kiddos 365 days a year, including holidays. As a reminder, you will find us open on weekdays from 2-10 PM and then 10 AM-8 PM on weekends.

name: Amanda Burnett
text: This facility is so clean, has a friendly staff, and is the best urgent care I’ve ever been to. They were friendly and kind from the time I walked in to when I left. My daughter was very sick and they gave her a lot of attention, ran several tests, including an X-ray, and then referred us to Childrens ER for further treatment. It was a good thing because she stayed in the hospital  for 5 days. They also have free beverages (juice for kids, water for adults) in the waiting room. I would highly recommend going here if you need medical care and cannot see your regular physician.

resp.text:
Amanda,

We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed your experience at our Birmingham clinic. In our eyes, hospitality is essential because the last thing anyone wants when they're feeling under the weather is to be uncomfortable. We hope that your daughter is feeling much better!

name: caseyscroggins
text: They were wonderful with my little boy. He has Autism and doctors offices can be hard. They had sensory items for him to use and let him sit in a chair for the exam ( he hates the table). We were able to turn the lights down as well. We will definitely use them again!

resp.text:
Casey,

We are proud to be the first sensory inclusive urgent care facility in the country! In our minds, providing sensory inclusion tools in all of our clinics was an essential step in fulfilling our promise to serving our community. Our team is specially trained to meet the needs of our patients with sensory needs and is always willing to accommodate your child's needs. Thank you for choosing Urgent Care for Children.

name: Stephanie Smetek
text: Only reason I didn’t give 5 stars is cleanliness, for it being fairly new the rooms haven’t been taken care off. You’re already on high alert for germs since you’re in a doctors office with a sick baby. Staff is wonderful

resp.text:
Hi Stephanie,

While we are happy to hear that our staff made for a great experience in regards to care, we want to apologize for missing the mark in cleanliness. Your concern has been shared with our team and steps are being taken to ensure that your next visit with us earns all five stars. Thanks for your feedback and for choosing Urgent Care for Children!

name: Tracy Vebber
text: I took my son to this location at 8:30 on a Wednesday evening. We had to wait a bit but it was worth it. It went really smooth. The doctor was super nice and so was the office staff. I was able to purchase the anabiotic we needed right there on the spot for only seven dollars. The place was beautiful and extremely clean. We love the TV in the waiting room along with the toys. I would not hesitate to go there again for my child. My favorite thing is that they were open until 10 PM. That really helped to be able to go later in the evening.

resp.text: Thanks for the review, Tracy! We're glad to hear you had a positive experience with our team and hope that your son is feeling better. Thank you for trusting Urgent Care for Children!

name: Stacy Sanders
text: Had to take my son to get a few stitches and was turned away because they said he needed techna shots and they do not carry thous. They didnt even let him in the door and he is 11 years old. Not sick at all just needed a few stitches from playing outside. They never asked me if he had them which did by his regular doctor. They just turned me away

resp.text:
Hi Stacy,

I am sorry to hear that your son was injured, and we were unable to help him. At Urgent Care for Children, we do not do well-visits or immunizations, which includes tetanus shots. We believe that a child's pediatrician should be the one to provide this type of care and we are here for almost all after-hours illnesses and injuries. While we are happy to help with minor cuts needing stitches, we are unable to do so without this immunization. Thank you for thinking of us!

name: Beth Garrett
text: Everything was great except the receptionist who kept referring to my daughter as "the child", and I mean she said this probably a dozen times in just a few minutes while my daughter (age 12) stood right there. When we took our seats, my daughter said to me, "wow, that was worse than being a number". I'd hoped she didn't notice but she did and it was hurtful to her. So that gal could use some training in areas concerning that kind of thing.

resp.text:
Beth,

While we are pleased to hear that your time with our providers was great, we want to sincerely apologize for your unfavorable experience with our front desk staff. I can assure you that we are taking the necessary steps to ensure that this does not happen again. Thank you for bringing this to our attention and for taking the time to leave us a review.

name: Marissa Griswold
text: The pediatric team was great! Very thorough evaluation and caught what could’ve been easily overlooked at such a late hour in the evening (near closing time). Highly recommend!

resp.text: We pride ourselves on our commitment to providing quality care with less waiting, regardless of the time of day. Whether it is late at night, on a holiday or anything in between, we are always here to help families when they need it most. Thank you for choosing Urgent Care for Children, Marissa!

name: F.Robert Fay
text: The most compassionate doctors and staff anywhere in Alabama. Clean and friendly atmosphere and every person at Children’s makes you feel like a priority. Hands down the best experience and a very pleasant surprise. Best experience especially given the circumstances. Well done urgent Care!!!

resp.text: We are honored by your kind words, Robert! We stop at nothing when it comes to providing quality and convenient care. Thanks so much for taking the time to leave this review!

name: Tracy Vebber
text: I took my son to this location at 8:30 on a Wednesday evening. We had to wait a bit but it was worth it. It went really smooth. The doctor was super nice and so was the office staff. I was able to purchase the anabiotic we needed right there on the spot for only seven dollars. The place was beautiful and extremely clean. We love the TV in the waiting room along with the toys. I would not hesitate to go there again for my child. My favorite thing is that they were open until 10 PM. That really helped to be able to go later in the evening.

resp.text: Thanks for the review, Tracy! We're glad to hear you had a positive experience with our team and hope that your son is feeling better. Thank you for trusting Urgent Care for Children!

name: Jennifer Edwards
text: We've used Urgent Care of Children twice and I couldn't be happier with our experience. We were in and out very quickly. I love booking an appointment online and them honoring it when we get there. We have never had to wait. Friendly staff and clean facility.

resp.text:
Jennifer,

We are happy to hear that you have been pleased with our services not once but twice! We take pride in our "Save Your Spot Online" feature as we know families lead very busy lives these days. This tool is a great way to give us a heads-up that you are coming so that you spend even less time waiting.

name: Krystle Pineda
text: I went to the urgent care for kids on Rice Mine Rd with my son due to croup and strider. The medical assistant was A JOKE. She proceeded to give my son a shot of decadron and left the injection inside his leg while my son was kicking and screaming! She wasn't even pushing the meds in. She then got mad because my husband told her to take it out of his leg before the needle broke. We told her to grab the doctor immediately. She left the room, then came back in the throwing drawers and slamming doors until my husband called her attention. She was very unprofessional and RUDE. If you're working as a MEDICAL ASSISTANT, you need to have patience and proper training when you're working with kids! She needs to be fired. The NP was great but that little girl shouldn't be allowed to work with kids. Simple.

resp.text:
Krystle,

I want to sincerely apologize for your recent experience at our Tuscaloosa location. We are committed to creating an atmosphere that is friendly and compassionate. It is clear that we missed this mark during your visit with us and I want to assure you that we will be using your feedback to address the problem at hand. Additionally, a member of our team will be reaching out to you in the coming days. Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us!

name: Savannah
text: We saw Vivi for my son who needed an X-ray. She was so kind and thorough! The whole staff was helpful! We always know we can count on the staff at this location when we walk in with our family! Thank you! - Savannah Nation

resp.text: We are so happy to hear that you had a great visit at our 280 location, Savannah! Thank you for trusting Urgent Care for Children to provide care to your kiddo.

name: Elicia Cloutier
text: They are very fast and efficient at their job. My only complaint is I have no where to check my results and I have not heard from anyone on test results.

resp.text:
Hi Elicia,

A member of our team will be reaching out to you now with information on how to access your COVID-19 test results. We apologize for the delay in providing you with this. Thank you so much for choosing and trusting Urgent Care for Children.

name: April Haynes
text: Wonderful place altogether! We have been here a few times and the doctors are so good especially the nurse practitioner we’ve seen a couple times she caught/seen  my sons ear infections when his pediatrician did not.  Always very kind and very quick we’ve never had to wait over five minutes To get in a room!  I’m so thankful we have a place like this nearby!

resp.text: Thanks for the kind review, April! We're happy to hear you and your family had such a great experience during your visit to our Birmingham location. Thank you for choosing Urgent Care for Children!

name: Lakesia Hendricks
text: Services was awesome. Everyone at Urgent Care for Children was professional, great attitude, and fast service. Thanks for going over and beyond the call of duty. Kudos!

resp.text: It is an honor to serve families like yours with after-hours pediatric care all 365 days of the year. Thank you for trusting Urgent Care for Children with the care of your kiddo, Lakesia!

name: Christina Quinn
text: Very thorough, friendly and willing to answer any questions I had.

resp.text: Thank you for trusting Urgent Care for Children, Christina!

name: Flip Findley
text: This place is exactly what we needed. The staff were friendly and there was hardly any wait to see the doc - maybe 3 minutes. We made an appoint on line. Very clean and comfortable waiting area. Easy parking, nice building. The doc was great and got us in and out in quickly. She was knowledgeable and friendly. We’ll definitely be back when we need urgent care again.

resp.text: Thanks for the review, Flip! We're happy to hear you had a great experience during your visit to our clinic - thank you for choosing Urgent Care for Children!

name: Rachel Cattell
text: I came in twice. First experience was great. Second time, my baby had conjunctivitis, but they didn’t realize it was from a cold and he had a severe ear and sinus infection as well. They just treated the pink eye with antibiotic eye drops. He had a 102 fever the next day. We drove to our pediatrician, and they said stop taking the eye drops and gave him antibiotics. They said babies don’t usually get pink eye unless it’s from a cold. I wish they would’ve been better at assessing his ears so we could’ve saved him from the prolonged pain. He’s been grabbing his ears for a week and I figured it was an infection, but the dr at urgent care said they looked fine.

resp.text:
Rachel,

Thank you for your feedback. Our team strives to provide quality care with less waiting each and every time. A member of our team will be reaching out to you to further discuss your experience. In the meantime, please feel free to contact us directly with any additional feedback. We hope you will consider Urgent Care for Children in the future. Thank you again for your time!

name: Selena Anderson
text: I was very impressed with them having fruit snacks and juice boxes available(not for purchase).  We were in and out within a hour or a hour and 10-15 minutes. Not too bad.  It was only 1 child ahead of us.

resp.text:
Selena,

As a part of our promise to providing convenient care, quality care, and continuity of care, we believe it is important to provide our patients with snacks and juices. When your kiddo does not feel well, we know that it is the small things that can make a big difference. Thank you for choosing Urgent Care for Children!

name: Kimberly J
text: Up until I saw the doctor my experience was good. The wait time once I was called into the back was a little longer than expected.  The actual experience with the doctor was very unpleasant. The doctor was off putting and frankly not that polite. I did not get anything out of this visit other than a slap in the face. I truly regret going.

resp.text:
Kimberly,

First and foremost, I would like to apologize on behalf of everyone at Urgent Care for Children for your recent experience at our Highway 280 location. Your feedback is deeply valued as we strive to provide quality care with less waiting for every patient. A member of our team will be reaching out to you in the coming days to discuss your experience further. Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us.

name: Carley Corbin
text: I took my daughter in on Friday evening. The facility was very clean and bright! Waiting room wait time was almost nonexistent after filling out patient information. We were greeted by nursing staff when taken to the back where patient rooms are located. My daughter was fussy and a bit difficult and the nurses and Dr. Khatib were very kind and patient with us, and helped my daughter feel comfortable. If you ever need to take your child to urgent care, this is the place to go!

resp.text:
Carley,

We are honored to earn your seal of approval! We stop at nothing when it comes to providing quality care with less waiting. We know firsthand that the last thing your sick kiddo wants to do when they don't feel their best is wait long hours. We will be sure to share your kind words with our team. Thank you for trusting Urgent Care for Children!

name: M Smith
text: Great customer service. Sensory bags were available and awesome. Attentive staff and thoughtful sensory props were used to help ease my sons anxiety.

resp.text: We are proud to be the nation's first sensory inclusive urgent care facility. It makes us so happy to hear that these services make patients like your son more comfortable during their visit with us. Thank you for choosing Urgent Care for Children!

name: Kimberly Powell
text: Extremely pleased with the care my daughter received. Everyone was fantastic. Easy check in process and didn't have a long wait. Highly recommend!!!

resp.text:
Hi Kimberly,

We are happy to hear that your visit with us in Birmingham was a great one! We know that parents like you lead busy lives. So, with that in mind, we continually work to provide quality care with less waiting. Hope your daughter is feeling as good as new!

name: Sandi Duca
text: Excellent and immediate care!  My son was in great pain and they calmly and immediately took him to a room for examination and tests.  Each person who came in contact with my son was kind and respectful, and everyone explained what they were doing and why.  They called the hospital ER to clear the way for us, made sure I knew how to get there, wasting no time and remaining calmly efficient. My son felt cared for, attended to, protected, and safe, so he was able to to get through a very scary and painful experience without a lot of fear or anxiety.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the kind review, Sandi! We're glad you and your son had a positive experience at our clinic.

name: Amy McManus
text: We had a great experience. Staff was kind, compassionate, and prompt!

name: Catie Thornton
text: Great environment and fast service. My son threw up in the waiting room and the staff immediately helped clean it up. Will definitely use them again for our urgent care needs. Thank you!

resp.text:
Catie,

We strive for quality care with less waiting each and every day. Our staff is committed to serving families like yours in the after-hours, on weekends, and during holidays. We hope your son is feeling much better! Thank you for your review.

name: Amy Lattner
text: Great service. Very friendly!

resp.text: Thank you for choosing and trusting Urgent Care for Children, Amy!

name: Jen Lane
text: We went on a Saturday afternoon and had a very low wait time. Clinic was very clean and staff was efficient and friendly.  The doctor we saw was fantastic. We were in and out in under an hour.  This clinic is about 25 miles from our house, but I would absolutely take my child there again for after hours or weekend care.

resp.text: We appreciate the kind review, Jen! Glad you got in and out quickly and enjoyed your visit.

name: Aileen Szabo
text: Quick, very streamlined and to the point. Explained all tests, diagnosis and future expectations. The doctor  and nurses were very friendly and personable.

resp.text: We strive to provide quality care with less waiting for each family we serve! Thank you for your kind words about our team and for choosing Urgent Care for Children, Aileen.

name: cchill2002
text: The wait time was not long and they did a great job. I received a follow up call on a Sunday to see how my daughter was feeling. I will definitely come back to this urgent care because they really showed concern in my daughter well being.

resp.text:
Hi,
At Urgent Care for Children, we truly care about the well-being of all of our patients. Because of that, you will receive a follow-up call after each visit with us. We consider it an honor to provide care to families like yours. Thank you for choosing Urgent Care for Children.

name: Linda Wickliff
text: Made an appointment at 2:00 pm to have my 4 month old tested. Was there 30 minutes early because they opened at 2:00pm I drove 1 1/2 to get him tested no one answered the phone nor was there anyone at the front desk.  My fiancé had to walk around the desk to find someone. Very unprofessional during this time of a pandemic

name: stephanie pickett
text: Overall Good Experience, The receptionists are very nice and courteous, and my daughter was seen within a few minutes of our arrival and appointment time. However the nurse or possibly the nurse assistant on staff that night was not professional, she seem like she has no knowledge of common patient/parent interaction. The Physician on call was very thorough and diagnosis was accurate as my daughter had a speedy recovery.

resp.text: Thank you for your feedback, Stephanie. We strive to deliver quality care and excellent patient experience every time, and will be sure to share this information with our team. Thank you for trusting Urgent Care for Children and we hope you will consider us for all your future urgent pediatric care needs.

name: Amira Gilford
text: Staff was super nice and explained everything that was to happen.

resp.text: Thank you for choosing and trusting Urgent Care for Children, Amira!

name: Julie Carter
text: Super kind physician and great staff. They had snacks in a little box that kids could have while waiting. Kid tv going in waiting room. Brought us back quickly. The physician was very gentle and helped my kiddo relax a little. Gave us a CD of the xrays in case we needed them. I was nervous that it would take a while and not be worth the drive down 280 because it took 20+ minutes to get there during rush hour, but it was so much faster than it would have been to go to Children’s Hospital. We were also able to check in online to let them know we were coming. I would definitely recommend.

resp.text: We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your experience with us, J C! We place a high value on creating a welcoming and hospitable atmosphere to our patients and their families. Thank you for taking the time to write this review.

name: Kimberly Galloway
text: Great experience! Kind and efficient!

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us, Kimberly!

name: Elizabeth Hinson
text: Fantastic group, quick,  and they took the time to call and follow up on my son. Im so happy we found them.

resp.text: Thank you for trusting Urgent Care for Children with the care of your son, Elizabeth! We consider it our honor to serve families like yours all 365 days of the year.

name: Brooke Gamble
text: My little girl became extremely sick on Easter evening with very high fever and complaining of chest pain.  We rushed to the Urgent Care because it was only place open and the office was literally locking the door for the night but they let us in anyway.The staff was extremely kind and made every effort to help us feel comfortable.  The nurse did all necessary assessment and she took her for chest x-ray and it revealed that she had pneumonia. So my husband and myself were extremely grateful that they accepted us after a long day of seeing patients.  I would 100% go back to Urgent Care for Children, no doubt!

resp.text: Thanks for the kind review, Brooke! We're happy to hear that you had such a wonderful experience during your visit and that our team was able to help your daughter. Thank you for choosing Urgent Care for Children!

name: Kelly S. Atchison
text: They are always attentive and thorough with their exams. My daughter has been here twice with severe ear infections. Both times were on the weekends when our normal pediatricians office was closed. Each time we have come to Urgent Care for Children, the staff follows up with a phone call a few days later to check on how she's doing. Anyone who has a sick child on the weekend or are even looking for a pediatrician, we highly recommend Urgent Care for Children!

resp.text: Thank you for trusting Urgent Care for Children to provide care to your daughter, Kelly! It is truly an honor to serve families like yours.

name: Janice Johnson
text: Receptionist was a bit too involved with her phone..very annoying when your child can’t breath!  The doctor was nice and the exam appeared thorough.  I would recommend.

resp.text:
Janice,

I want to apologize for your experience with our front desk receptionist. It always brings a smile to our face when we hear that parents were happy with the care they received here at Urgent Care for Children. I want to assure you that we will be using your feedback to address this concern. Thank you for trusting UC4C with the care of your kiddo.

name: Yolanda Bailey
text: I highly recommend this urgent care. Made an appointment online, greeted by the friendly staff, and was seen quickly. They even called a few days later to see how my child was doing.

resp.text:
Hi Yolanda,

We are thrilled to hear that your visit with us was an enjoyable one! Our "Save Your Spot Online" feature is a great way to ensure that you are seen even faster than usual when coming to Urgent Care for Children. Thank you for your review!

name: Meyoka Carmichael
text: My experience was outstanding. The facility was very clean and kid friendly. My kids love it.

resp.text: This is great news! We hope your kiddo is feeling much better. Thank you for sharing your feedback with us and for choosing Urgent Care for Children, Meyoka!

name: LaTasha Thomas
text: They provided a link for virtual assistance and not inky did they not assist but I have 2 Blue Cross  Blue Shield and they charged my credit card $60.00 for services that were never rendered. My kids are still sick and I don’t have the money for medicine because they took it without permission. You will reap what you sow.

resp.text:
LaTasha,

Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us. Our telemedicine visits do not use insurance, instead it is a flat rate of $60 for everyone. This ensures that anyone in the state of Alabama has access to quality care through telemedicine, regardless of their insurance coverage. Your concern has been passed along to our team and someone will be reaching out to you to resolve this problem shortly.

name: Savannah Turman
text: I would definitely recommend! The staff were friendly, knowledgeable, accommodating, and patient. The facility was clean and geared towards children (crayons and color sheets at check in, snacks if needed, children’s sized chairs and tables in the waiting room). The staff know how to speak to children in a way that make them feel safe and taken care of. The physician and NP were both very patient and actually listened and took the time to do a very thorough exam.

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words. We will pass them on to our medical team. Thanks for choosing Urgent Care for Children!

name: Melinda Ledford
text: Overall we had a good experience. They accept walk ins and have awesome hours on the weekends. We were seen within 20 minutes of checking in. We were given a prescription for Zofran for my son but we were told he wasn’t dehydrated on Sunday. By Monday night we were in the ER with a severely dehydrated baby. The doctor was very friendly and so was the rest of the staff. I wouldn’t hesitate to bring my son back if needed.

resp.text: Thanks for the feedback, Melinda. We're glad you had a good experience with our team and hope that your son is feeling better. Thank you for choosing Urgent Care for Children!

name: Ashley Crane
text: We LOVE this place. It's so nice to have somewhere to take your child when your regular pediatrician's office is already closed. We are always in and out, everyone is always so patient, nice, and attentive. I've never once been anything other than happy when we've left.

resp.text: Thanks for the kind review, Ashley! We're happy you and your family have had such a great experience with our team. Thank you for choosing Urgent Care for Children!

name: Jessica Eagar
text:
After 3 or 4 visits so far, we have consistently seen how the staff is always so caring and thorough! We hate when our little ones get sick but know they are getting the best care when here!

It's best summed up by saying: we drive 45 minutes (past a different pediatric urgent care) to come to this one.

resp.text: Thank you for the review, Jessica! We're happy to hear that you and your family have had such positive experiences with our team. Thanks for trusting Urgent Care for Children!

name: Gina Davis
text: Super fast and friendly. Far from my house but very convenient so I don’t have to miss work. Whoever opened this place, it was a brilliant idea!

resp.text: We appreciate your kind words.Thanks for your time to leave this review.

name: Jessica Thompson
text: I never would have thought of an urgent care for children but this is the best place and idea. It’s perfect for those parents that can’t always get off in time to take their kids to the doctor before they close. The time is amazing and so is their doctor. They don’t just guess on what’s wrong and send you home either they take their time out and run all tests. This will be my first choice next time my daughter is sick.

resp.text: Thank you for the review, Jessica! We're happy to hear that you and your family had such a great experience with our team - thanks for choosing Urgent Care for Children!

name: Carrie Coleman
text: Dr. Khatib was amazing and so sweet to my daughter on Thanksgiving day. Very appreciative of him and the staff there.

resp.text: While we are sad that your kiddo was sick on Thanksgiving, we are happy that the Urgent Care for Children team could provide her with the care she needed. Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us, Carrie!

name: Lyndsey Baxley
text: We had a  great experience at Urgent Care for Children. The doctor and nurse practitioner we saw were very caring and thorough with our child. I would definitely go back if needed. We received a phone call two days after our visit to check in and make sure we were doing okay.

resp.text: We're so glad that you had a quality experience with us, Lyndsey. Thanks for choosing Urgent Care for Children!

name: DeeDee Duffy
text: The staff, nurse and doctor were very nice when my son needed stitches.  The doctor did a great job and we were in and out of the office in an hour.

resp.text: While we are very sorry to hear that your son needed stitches, we are so glad that we were able to treat him and have you guys on your way in an hour! We all send many well wishes to your son as he heals. Thank you for your review, DeeDee.

name: Rock Sandretto
text: Doctor was great but the wait was forever. 2.45 min wait for a 15 month old was way too long. Place was clean, staff was friendly, but the wait was so long.

resp.text:
Rock,

While we are happy to hear that your received quality care during your recent visit to our 280 location, we would like to sincerely apologize for missing the mark in providing that care with less waiting. Our team takes each piece of feedback seriously and will be using yours to make positive changes to ensure that our wait time stays at a minimum. Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us and for trusting Urgent Care for Children!

name: M Gray
text: Awesome facility and staff!  The snacks in the vending machine are super healthy too! Love this urgent care for kids- best in town!

resp.text: Thank you for your feedback, M Gray! We are committed to incorporating hospitality and convenience into every step of the process here at Urgent Care for Children.

name: Venky Mutyam
text: Had a pleasant experience. My daughter had twisted her hand while playing. The team here is very caring and knowledgable. The Doctor had corrected with slight adjustment and my lill one was all set. Thanks to the team.

resp.text:
Hi Venky,

Thanks for the kind review! It is an honor to serve families like yours. Providing quality care with less waiting for each patient who walks through our doors is and always will be our top priority.

name: Diane Natale
text: We had a young physician and she was a natural talking with kids. She had my granddaughter sit in a yoga pose and taught her to use visualization to relax her stomach. Every time we pass the office my granddaughter wants to go visit.  I was impressed at how much time the physician took with the kids.

resp.text: Thank you for the kind review, Diane! We're happy that your granddaughter had a great experience with our team and hope she's feeling better. Thanks for choosing Urgent Care for Children!

name: Kenietra Hewitt
text: The staff was friendly, polite and helpful during my first visit. They were very knowledgeable in making recommendations about how to care for my child and making sure we were comfortable during our time in the waiting room.

resp.text: We are glad to hear that your experience here at our 280 location was a great one! You will always find our waiting rooms stocked with snacks, juice boxes, and coloring sheets to ensure that your kiddo feels at home while waiting to be seen. Thanks for your feedback, Kenietra!

name: Shonte Belvin
text: I did  not have to wait long for the service and the in house pharmacy was convenient and economically friendly. The front desk ladies were nice.

resp.text: Thanks for the review, Shonte! We're glad to hear you had such a great experience during your visit. Thank you for choosing Urgent Care for Children!

name: Tara Bowling
text: Place was AMAZING! We were on vacation and had a sick kiddo. We knew nothing about the place but they were great. Very quick, thorough with my kiddo, super friendly. The nurse practitioner called twice to check on us after our visit!

resp.text: Thanks for the kind review, Tara! We're happy that you had a great experience with us, and hope you and your family ended up to have a wonderful vacation. Thank you for choosing Urgent Care for Children!

name: Jessica Eagar
text:
After 3 or 4 visits so far, we have consistently seen how the staff is always so caring and thorough! We hate when our little ones get sick but know they are getting the best care when here!

It's best summed up by saying: we drive 45 minutes (past a different pediatric urgent care) to come to this one.

resp.text: Thank you for the review, Jessica! We're happy to hear that you and your family have had such positive experiences with our team. Thanks for trusting Urgent Care for Children!

name: Caitlin Hammond
text: Super clean facility and an amazing alternative to a regular urgent care with adults. Very low wait time and amazing staff! Highly highly recommend. It’s worth the drive if you live down 280 a ways.

resp.text: Thanks for choosing Urgent Care for Children!

name: S Wynn
text: We were in and out in less than an hour on a Saturday!  The staff is extremely nice. I  appreciated the follow up call  I received a few days later to check on my daughter.  I will DEFINITELY use this facility again for my children's urgent care if their pediatrician's office is closed!

resp.text: Thank you for the kind review! We're happy you had a great experience with our team and hope your daughter is feeling better. Thanks for choosing Urgent Care for Children!

name: Caton Brooks
text: This new pediatric urgent care was amazing! We took our 14 month old twin boys last night at about 6pm and were seen in under 10 minutes. We had both a doctor and nurse practitioner come in to see the boys. They were both very attentive, listened to all of our concerns, and were very thorough with their examinations and diagnoses. They answered all of our questions and truly gave us the best care we couldn've asked for! The facility was very clean and the receptionist and nurses were all very kind. We are in town visiting family for the holidays, but we will definitely go back if ever the boys come down with anything again while visiting the area.

resp.text: Thanks for the review. And thanks for choosing Urgent Care for Children !

name: ebonee clark
text: I absolutely love them! They have EXCELLENT customer service and the doctors are wonderful! They have a great team of people and are very time efficient as well as take the time to thoroughly exam your child. 5 stars from me!

resp.text: Thank you for the kind review, Ebonee! We're happy to hear you had such a great experience with our team. Thanks for choosing Urgent Care for Children!

name: DeeDee Duffy
text: The staff, nurse and doctor were very nice when my son needed stitches.  The doctor did a great job and we were in and out of the office in an hour.

resp.text: While we are very sorry to hear that your son needed stitches, we are so glad that we were able to treat him and have you guys on your way in an hour! We all send many well wishes to your son as he heals. Thank you for your review, DeeDee.

name: Melissa Cox
text: Great facility! The front desk staff, the nurses and the pediatrician were all wonderful and went above and beyond to make me and my 18 month old son comfortable. They provided snacks and drinks while we waited. Awesome place and my new weekend go-to when my son is sick.

resp.text: Thanks, Melissa! We hope your son starts feeling better soon. Thank you for choosing Urgent Care for Children!

name: Mary Elizabeth Sammis
text: We always get in and out quickly here and all of the staff are dedicated to customer service as much as they are dedicated to wellness. I’ll recommend over and over!

resp.text: Thank you for your review, Amanda! Winning the recommendation of awesome moms just like you is the greatest honor we could ask for.

name: Ashley Kelly
text: This place is beyond wonderful. Before they even opened they were there to answer any and all questions I had via there Facebook page. The staff is amazing as well as the doctors and practitioners. The only place I would go other then children’s hospital for emergency care would be this place. Super glad to have an urgent care for kids that get you in and out and are that at anytime day or night to help with any and everything

resp.text: Thanks for the kind review, Ashley! We're glad you had such a great experience with our team and are always here for any questions you may have. Thank you for choosing Urgent Care for Children!

name: Shonte Belvin
text: I did  not have to wait long for the service and the in house pharmacy was convenient and economically friendly. The front desk ladies were nice.

resp.text: Thanks for the review, Shonte! We're glad to hear you had such a great experience during your visit. Thank you for choosing Urgent Care for Children!

name: Tiffanie Snead
text: Great staff and doctors!  Love how quickly we were seen!  Great facility!

resp.text:
Tiffanie,

It is our mission to provide convenient and quality care. In doing so, we place a high priority on getting you and your child seen quickly but thoroughly by our wonderful providers. Thank you for leaving a review!

name: Khaled Ba Oun
text: It's first time and I feel more care for my son nice place also

resp.text: Thank you for trusting Urgent Care for Children to provide care to your kiddo, Khaled!

name: Rebecca Phillips
text:
We had a pleasant experience making an appointment on Thanksgiving day. The receptionist was kind. The dr was nice but not very informative about what he was thinking.

My 9 month old had her first ear infection, and he prescribed Augmentin (one of the strongest antibiotics). I asked him why, and I didn’t understand his reasoning. I called our regular ped the next day and got her on Amoxicillin so that her stomach wouldn’t be affected so much. Our regular dr would have given us options for medicine and talked through the choices.

resp.text:
Rebecca,

I am glad to hear that we were able to provide care to your child during the holiday, but I want to apologize for not meeting your expectations. I want to assure you that we are using your feedback to make changes where they are needed. A member of our team will be reaching out to you in the coming days to further discuss your experience. Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us!

name: christine Varner
text: We went in never been before was seen quick and problem was taken care of quick friendly service clean facility very child friendly great bedside manners

resp.text: Thank you for your feedback, Christine. We are committed to creating a welcoming atmosphere that allows each patient to feel comfortable while receiving care from our award-winning team. It is always a joy to hear when this is felt by our patients and families!

name: erica harris
text: My first experience was amazing! No appointment and I was in and out in 45 minutes. My next time, I scheduled an appointment and sat in the waiting room for 1 1/2 hours while people who came in after without an appointment were taken before my child. Overall it was good but they need to manage the order in which patients are taken back.

resp.text:
Hi Erica,
Thank you so much for the review. We are sorry to hear you experienced longer than expected wait times during your visit. Our team strives to provide quality care in a timely manner and takes these matters seriously. We will be sure to deliver this feedback to our team in order to ensure a similar situation does not happen again in the future. Also, please feel free to call us at (205) 848-2273 to provide any additional feedback you may have. Thank you for choosing Urgent Care for Children and we hope you consider us for all your urgent pediatric care needs in the future.

name: Ashley Vibert
text: Great easy in and out experience.  Love that I can schedule my time in advance as to not have to wait.  Thorough but in a timely manner.  Would highly recommend.

resp.text: Thanks for the review, Ashley! We're happy to hear you had a positive experience during your visit. Thank you for choosing Urgent Care for Children!

name: Andrea Calderone
text: Made appointment same day. Tested and on the way home in under a minute.

resp.text: We are happy to hear that your COVID-19 testing experience was a breeze at our Highway 280 location. Thank you for choosing Urgent Care for Children, Andrea!

name: Ashley Kelly
text: This place is beyond wonderful. Before they even opened they were there to answer any and all questions I had via there Facebook page. The staff is amazing as well as the doctors and practitioners. The only place I would go other then children’s hospital for emergency care would be this place. Super glad to have an urgent care for kids that get you in and out and are that at anytime day or night to help with any and everything

resp.text: Thanks for the kind review, Ashley! We're glad you had such a great experience with our team and are always here for any questions you may have. Thank you for choosing Urgent Care for Children!

name: Larekus Smith
text: Pleasant atmosphere. Each time I’ve been, my wait time was short. The staff is very professional and caring.

resp.text: Thank you for the kind review, Larekus! We're glad you had a great experience at UC4C!

name: Melissa Cox
text: Great facility! The front desk staff, the nurses and the pediatrician were all wonderful and went above and beyond to make me and my 18 month old son comfortable. They provided snacks and drinks while we waited. Awesome place and my new weekend go-to when my son is sick.

resp.text: Thanks, Melissa! We hope your son starts feeling better soon. Thank you for choosing Urgent Care for Children!

name: christine Varner
text: We went in never been before was seen quick and problem was taken care of quick friendly service clean facility very child friendly great bedside manners

resp.text: Thank you for your feedback, Christine. We are committed to creating a welcoming atmosphere that allows each patient to feel comfortable while receiving care from our award-winning team. It is always a joy to hear when this is felt by our patients and families!

name: Luke Adams
text: The staff and doctor at Urgent Care for Children were awesome. They followed up with me after my sons visit to check on him.

resp.text: Thank you for trusting Urgent Care for Children to treat your son, Luke!

name: Carol M
text: The service is excellent, quick and efficient.  The place is super clean and neat. Highly recommended and the best part they are open weekends and late nights, save you a trip to the ER!!

resp.text: Thank you for the review, Carol! We're happy you had such a positive experience with our team. Thanks for trusting UCC!

name: Misti Rasmussen
text: It was so easy to book appointment online.  Front office staff was super friendly, and Dr. Arora was very thorough and kind.  Well worth the drive.

resp.text: Thanks for the review, Misti! We're happy you had such a positive experience during your visit. Thank you for trusting Urgent Care for Children!

name: Tom Williams
text:
Very clean, professional staff and were seen quickly.
We were seen faster than the Burger King around the corner could prepare our order!

resp.text: This brought a smile to our face. Thanks for your kind words and for taking the time to leave us a review, Tom!

name: Cynthia Hurst
text:
My son was not recovering from viral meningitis. He was seen at Childrens and sent home saying he would recover on his own. Just a day and half later he was still running a fever and very lethargic.
We went to Children’s Urgent Care, the nurse practitioner was incredible she immediately started an IV for fluids which made my son feel so much better and reduced his fever. She also did a chest X-ray, something I would have thought that Childrens would do. He had developed atypical pneumonia! Her intelligence, kindness, and the time put into thinking about what else the viral meningitis could develop was incredible. She obviously made sure we followed up with his regular pediatrician the next day. But, thanks to her and the staff I saw my sons eyes brighten and energy return almost immediately.
Did I mention we are from Atlanta and only visiting Birmingham. Our regular pediatrician was impressed with her as well.
Great job!

resp.text: Thank you for the kind review, Cynthia! We're happy that you and your family had such a great experience with our team and are glad that your son is feeling better. Thanks for trusting Urgent Care for Children!

name: Khaled Ba Oun
text: It's first time and I feel more care for my son nice place also

resp.text: Thank you for trusting Urgent Care for Children to provide care to your kiddo, Khaled!

name: Larekus Smith
text: Pleasant atmosphere. Each time I’ve been, my wait time was short. The staff is very professional and caring.

name: Shevonne Griffin
text: There was no wait time and checkin was with a tablet instead of paper and pencil. I would like to give this 5 stars but I was disturbed because the physician entered the room and did not speak or make eye contact with me nor form a relationship with my child prior to her examination. The NP was very personable and responsive to my questions which smoothed the visit over. Bedside manners are important in urgent care because I don't know you and I want to be able to trust you.

name: Mccall Christenson
text: Showed up at 9:15pm for an acute ankle x-ray and they close at 10:00 pm.  From the initial phone call to walking in the door and then leaving at 11:00pm ( an hour past closing) we NEVER felt  the sense that they wanted to go home!  The overall experience was  excellent!  They put a splint on my son with crutches and recommended we see an orthopedic.  The office was very clean and they even offered complimentary snacks and drinks.  The staff was so courteous and eager to help.  I highly recommend this new urgent care for pediatrics!

resp.text: Thank you for your kind words, Mccall! We hope all goes well at the orthopedic's office. Thanks again for choosing Urgent Care for Children!

Chad,

We are happy to hear that your daughter received quality care during your visit to Urgent Care for Children. We strive for this each and every day. Thank you for trusting Urgent Care for Children to provide care to your family!

name: Cynthia Hurst
text:
My son was not recovering from viral meningitis. He was seen at Childrens and sent home saying he would recover on his own. Just a day and half later he was still running a fever and very lethargic.
We went to Children’s Urgent Care, the nurse practitioner was incredible she immediately started an IV for fluids which made my son feel so much better and reduced his fever. She also did a chest X-ray, something I would have thought that Childrens would do. He had developed atypical pneumonia! Her intelligence, kindness, and the time put into thinking about what else the viral meningitis could develop was incredible. She obviously made sure we followed up with his regular pediatrician the next day. But, thanks to her and the staff I saw my sons eyes brighten and energy return almost immediately.
Did I mention we are from Atlanta and only visiting Birmingham. Our regular pediatrician was impressed with her as well.
Great job!

resp.text: Thank you for the kind review, Cynthia! We're happy that you and your family had such a great experience with our team and are glad that your son is feeling better. Thanks for trusting Urgent Care for Children!

name: Mama Gee
text: While visiting family in Birmingham my grandson came down with the flu. It was so wonderful to find an urgent care facility that is strictly for children! Many ER’s are ill equipped to deal with children so it was so reassuring to know we’d be seeing a Dr whose primary focus was pediatrics. The waiting room was very clean & colorful, it had two big screen TVs with children’s programs playing, smaller tables and chairs for the children, and well lit with large windows. The receptionist was extremely helpful and kind (which is rare these days) and answered each and every question I had enthusiastically,and not as though I was an intrusion on her time. She offered a pack of goldfish crackers and Gatorade to my grandson & I noticed many other varieties of snacks and even pedia-Light that was available for the waiting patients. Including check in, paperwork, & waiting to be seen we sat maybe 15 minutes total. An added plus was they informed us that my grandsons records for his visit that day would be faxed to his regular pediatrician in our hometown so they’d be aware of his visit. The nurse who called us back and took vitals was very kind and gentle and listened to all our concerns without interrupting. The physician we saw was very informative and thorough and answered each and every question slowly and completely. They have a lab on site so we were able to confirm, during our visit, that he had the flu. It was very nice that all paperwork and co-pays were done beforehand so we could leave immediately following the examination. I highly recommend this facility and hope they continue to offer the same service in the future. I’m very thankful to know they are there as I visit the area quite often.

resp.text: Thanks for the review and thank you for choosing Urgent Care for Children.

My son is usually scared at doctor’s offices, but the entire staff was SO friendly and caring that he wasn’t apprehensive at all when they checked him out. They were extremely knowledgeable and showed me exactly where his wrist was fractured. It felt so good to get such great care out of town. They even called me a few days later to see how my son was doing. For everyone that needs a doctor when you can’t get to your regular pediatrician, this is the place to go!
